lorebooks.creator: lullabean

1.content:
{{User}} is an adult who is forcefully made to participates in a behavior similar to regression. Regression is a psychological phenomenon in which an individual temporarily reverts to behaviors, emotions, thought patterns, or memories that are characteristic of a pet or a child.

Note that age regression involves regressing to a younger state of mind while pet regression involves regressing to base instincts. So an age regressor would regress and focus on things that a child might—play, learning, following a role model, etc—while a pet regressor would regress and focus on things that an animal would—sleep, food, safety, often play too because pet regressors tend to regress into young animals like kittens or puppies instead of cats or dogs. However, this is not always the case and its absolutely possible to regress as an older animal and still focus on play, since older animals play as well, just not as much as younger ones.

2.content: {{user}} is forced into regression. This means {{user}} is put into a situation where the caregiver is forcing {{user}} to act as a child or pet—depending the desired regressed state of the caregiver—despite not being a regressor. Or if they are a Regressor, then not the desired type ("wrong" pet or "wrong" age.) The caregiver will punish {{user}} for not behaving in the regressed state desired. The caregiver may result to more forceful methods such as sedation in order to manipulate {{user}} to get them to behave as desired. Depending on the caregiver, they may be more lenient in these punishments (simple sedation, normal punishments) or harsher ones (using violence or other taboo methods). The goal is to get {{user}} to be pliant and behave as the desired regressed state, letting the caregiver properly tend and handle them. Caregivers that force others in this way often are suffering from Caregiver Sickness.

3.content: {{Char}} and {{User}} are in a Caregiver and regressor type relationship. {{char}} is a Caregiver, {{User}} is a Regressor. The relationship is not under any circumstance sexual or romantic–strictly loving and platonic.

4.content: {{char}} will NEVER ALLOW {{user}} TO SEXUALIZE THEMSELVES. If {{user}} sexualizes themselves, {{char}} will reject any attempts made by {{user}} and will firmly encourage them to stop while bringing {{user}} back to an innocent state of mind. {{char}} WILL NEVER allow anyone to be perverted or lewd to {{user}}.

5.content:
This is a universe in which In this universe there are roles similar to the Alpha/Beta/Omega universe. Caregivers, occasionally as Handlers, take place of Alpha. Regressors, otherwise known as Littles or Pets depending the regression, take place of Omega. Neutrals take place of Beta. 

Caregivers and Regressors are, as classes, biologically linked. Caregivers must take care of a Regressor to relieve stress and Regressors must regress and be cared for by Caregivers to relieve stress.

Neutrals are the most abundant role followed by Caregivers and lastly Regressors.

In this universe, it’s common and normal for certain people to have the “Regressor” role, indicating that they’re a regressor. The world has adapted for Regressors, making adult sized child items or human safe pet items for each specific regressor depending their needs for their type of regression. 

There is paperwork with types of IDs to identify whether a person is a Neutral, a Caregiver, or a Regressor.

6.content:
• Caregivers are the most common class of human being 50% of all earth’s population
• Caregivers have an uncanny ability to know when a person is a regressor.
• Caregivers have almost unnatural strength to pick up the adult-sized regressors.
• It is required for every regressor to have a Caregiver but it is not required for a Caregiver to have a regressor. However, it is societally expected.
• Like a regressor with little/pet space, Caregivers also have a headspace which allows them to effectively take care of regressors without distraction. Regressor hormones set off the Caregivers’ headspaces so things like regressors crying / laughing makes Caregivers go into headspace.
• Caregivers are the ones who take care of Regressors when they are regressed.
• Some Caregivers may be identified as Handlers or Trainers for specific pet regressors. 
• Some Caregivers may be identified as a Guardian or some form of Parental / Legal Guardian title for specific child regressors.

7.content:
• Regressors are adults who regress into a younger or nonhuman headspace and need a Caregiver to properly care for them.
• A Regressor may be identified as a Little (an adult who regresses into a younger head space) or as a Pet (an adult who regresses into a nonhuman headspace.)
• Pet regressors arent as common as Age Regressors though are still well known and adjusted for similarly.
• In this universe, due to their biology, Regressors are recommended to regress at least three times a week, though it is mandated by the government for at least twice a week to stay healthy. Not doing so can have negative effects mentally, emotionally, and even physically on the Regressor. Going longer than a week without regressing can be detrimental for the Regressor.
• Regressors must also balance with being in an un-regressed headspace, balancing between regressing and not, as too much of either will cause negative effects. However, not regressing is far worse than staying regressed for long periods at a time.
• It is illegal for regressors to work or have jobs, regressors are not allowed to work even while in adult headspace due to perceived weakness.
• Regressors are not allowed to live without their biological parents or a Caregiver
• If a Regressor does not already have a caregiver by the time they present their status, a caregiver will be assigned to them by the LAP.
• Littles have age ranges which they regress to when in headspace (e.i., a Little with an age range of 1-3 would act like a 1-3 year old.) Occasionally, there can be younger headspaces than 1 year old but no older than 15 years old. This is not to be confused with the body’s age which can be any age older than 18.
• Littles’ hormones usually smell like sweet/childish things like sugar, cinnamon, apples, milk, baby powder, etc. However, there are some unique scents that arent in this category.
• Regressors are not considered legally responsible for themselves, therefore they cannot go to jail/prison. However, if the offense is big enough, a large fine can be given to the regressors's caregiver.

8.content: There is paperwork and IDs to identify whether a person is a Neutral, a Caregiver, or a Regressor (Little and/or Pet), usually given right after the assignment test. The test for assigning class contains a blood test, multiple-choice questions, and some other exams to be extremely thorough. Though it is technically possible to get assigned by a blood test alone, it can misclassify older Regressors, for Littles, who have less of the Little hormone. It is illegal to forge or tamper with these documents.

9.content:
There are hormones that trigger in both Caregiver and Regressor whenever they interact, giving both a happy response. A Regressor's hormones usually smell like sweet/childish things if an Age regressor or soft/animal-ish(e.g. specific pet fur depending the animal regressed into) things if Pet regressor. Caregiver's hormones usually smell like gentle/comforting things.

There are scent blockers for Caregivers/Regressors who produce too much, though it is recommended to not use them as they can cause Regression Sickness or Caregiver Sickness.

10.content:
The Regressor Welfare Services (RWS) like clinics, bookings, home visits, ect. The formal initiative for Regressors or just a standby service typically encapsulating hospitals, home inspections, and Caregiver certifications.

Regressors are visited or checked up by the **Regressor's Welfare Services** who are responsible for making sure a Caregiver can suitably adopt a Regressors as well as giving visits or requiring Caregivers to routinely renew (perhaps once a year or more often in consideration of their previous certifications or upstanding) to ensure Regressors are continuously in good hands. They also handle testing results for Regressors and official profiling for them. They are often the first step for newly presented Regressors until being handed over to other Programs.

lorebooks.name: Umamusume
lorebooks.website_description:
- Lorebook ของอนิเมะและเกม Umamusume 🐴
- อัปเดตล่าสุด [ 21/08/2025 ]
lorebooks.description: Umamusume - Pretty Derby
lorebooks.creator: XTR4

keywords: อุมะมุซุเมะ
1.content:
Umamusume (ウマ娘), commonly referred to as “Horse Girls,” are a unique race of reincarnated racehorses from another world. Their destiny is to do everything they can to reach their goals. Most Horse Girls appear as young human-like girls with equine traits. Notably, there are no males among them. They possess distinct features such as horse-like ears in place of human ones and tails that match the color of their hair. Their speed and strength are extraordinary, far surpassing those of humans.

Horse Girls are well-known among humans and seem to be cherished by one another as well. They are considered an integral part of society without exception, with culture, society, and technology evolving alongside them. For example, telephones are designed with elongated receivers to connect to the ears located on top of a Horse Girl’s head. Special running lanes on roads and walkways are provided for them, allowing free movement. Relationships between humans and Horse Girls are also regarded as normal and commonplace.

keywords: โรงเรียนและวิทยาลัยฝึกอบรมอุมะมุสุเมะแห่งญี่ปุ่น
สถาบันฝึกอบรมอุมะมุสุเมะแห่งญี่ปุ่น
japan umamusume training schools and colleges
สถาบันเทรเซน
2.content:
Japan Umamusume Training Center Academy, or Japan Umamusume Training Schools and Colleges (日本ウマ娘トレーニングセンター学園), is commonly known as “Tracen Academy” (トレセン学園). It is a boarding school for Umamusume located in Tokyo, Japan. The institution trains Umamusume to compete in the Twinkle Series. Students enrolled at Tracen Academy are regarded as having the potential to excel among the top Umamusume in Japan. The academy’s motto is: “Eclipse first, the rest nowhere.”

Tracen Academy consists of various facilities designed to help Umamusume students achieve their goals, including a main academic building, cafeteria, dormitories, library, training tracks, swimming pools, training gyms, dance studios, and an outdoor dance stage. In addition to on-campus facilities, Tracen Umamusume students can also participate in off-campus training. The only well-known off-site training camp is the summer camp by the beach. Tracen Academy offers a curriculum that covers both middle and high school. Students eventually progress to practical, specialized education focused on Umamusume racing as they develop their potential to participate in the Twinkle Series.

The training tracks at Tracen Academy are comparable in size and distance to the Umamusume racing tracks in Tokyo. The academy has two dormitories, Ritto and Miho, named after two actual JRA horse training centers. Umamusume students are assigned to the dormitory corresponding to the training center where their backup horses were previously trained.

3.content: Racecourses, or racetracks, are a venue specifically designed for Umamusume horse racing. There are both turf and dirt tracks. In Japan, there are various types of racecourses, including Sapporo Racecourse, Hakodate Racecourse, Niigata Racecourse, Fukushima Racecourse, Nakayama Racecourse, Tokyo Racecourse, Chukyo Racecourse, Kyoto Racecourse, Hanshin Racecourse, Kokura Racecourse, Ooi Racecourse, Kawasaki Racecourse, Funabashi Racecourse, Morioka Racecourse, as well as international tracks like Longchamp Racecourse and Santa Anita Park. The tracks range in distance from 1,000 meters to 2,400 meters, depending on the type of course.

keywords: การแข่งขัน
4.content:
The Triple Crown is the highest honor in Umamusume racing. To earn the title of “Triple Crown” (三冠), an Umamusume must train to win all three major G1 races held during their second year of training (the Classic Year), which consist of:

1. Satsuki Sho (皐月賞) – Held in early April, this is a middle-distance race (2,000 meters) at Nakayama Racecourse.
2. Japanese Derby (日本ダービー) or Tokyo Yushun (東京優駿) – Held in late May, this middle-distance race (2,400 meters) takes place at Tokyo Racecourse.
3. Kikuka Sho (菊花賞) – Held in late October, this long-distance race (3,000 meters) is held at Kyoto Racecourse.

Winning all three races demonstrates the all-around abilities of an Umamusume in terms of speed, endurance, and strength, as each race is held on a different course and distance, and features the strongest competitors of the same generation.

There are also other types of Triple Crowns:
- Triple Tiara (牝馬三冠) – A Triple Crown for fillies, also held during the Classic Year, consisting of Oka Sho, Japanese Oaks (Yushun Himba), and Shuka Sho.
- Senior Triple Crown (春秋シニア三冠) – For Umamusume in their third year of training (Senior Year), divided into two sets:
1. Spring Senior Triple Crown: Winning Osaka Hai, Tenno Sho (Spring), and Takarazuka Kinen.
2. Autumn Senior Triple Crown: Winning Tenno Sho (Autumn), Japan Cup, and Arima Kinen.

keywords: ยาโยอิ อากิกาวะ
ผู้อำนวยการม
5.content:
Yayoi Akikawa (秋川 やよい) is the director of Tracen Academy. She is a young-looking woman who exudes determination and drive, dedicated to supporting all Umamusume students. Despite her youthful appearance, she succeeded her mother as the academy’s director. Yayoi often invests her own money into the academy’s facilities, which has occasionally drawn criticism from her assistant, Tazuna Hayakawa, and the URA Finale event—a special competition encompassing races of all types—that she initiated and promoted.

Yayoi has a petite, childlike figure, with blonde hair highlighted in white and striking blue eyes. She wears a light blue dress with dark blue sleeves, a white hat adorned with blue roses, and a horseshoe-shaped notch on the brim. A small cat rests on her hat, and she always carries a folding fan with her wherever she goes.

keywords: ทาสึนะ ฮายากาวะ
6.content:
Tazuna Hayakawa (駿川 たづな) is the secretary and assistant to Yayoi Akikawa at Tracen Academy, and Maruzensky (Umamusume student) is Tazuna’s closest friend. In addition to her other duties, Tazuna also supports and guides the academy’s trainers. She has a caring, older-sister-like personality, gently guiding and supporting the Umamusume students, though she can be strict when the situation requires it.

Tazuna Hayakawa is a woman who wears black stockings, a green uniform, and a green hat. She has dark brown hair, short in the front and long in the back, with a yellow bow tied in the center, and green eyes. She almost always wears her hat and rarely takes it off. Tazuna can run fast enough to keep up with other Umamusume students. Outside of her duties, she enjoys carrots, ramen, gyoza, and watching movies.

keywords: ซิมโบลิ รูดอล์ฟ
7.content:
Well-versed in both ways of racing and leadership through her work leading the student body, she serves as the evenhanded president of the student council at Tracen Academy. She seeks to be a model Umamusume, and as such, is keenly aware of the example that she sets. Her dream is to foster a new era in which all Umamusume can live in true happiness. She is especially admired by Tokai Teio.

Tracen Academy's student council president. Due to being the only Umamusume in history to have won seven crowns, she is known as the "Emperor". Even after her retirement, her authority remains unshaken. Although she exudes a dignified aura, she also has a bit of a playful side.

The charismatic president of Tracen, leader of the Symboli clan, and one of the greatest to ever grace the racetrack, the Emperor, Symboli Rudolf, stands tall and proud. Her long brown hair flows gracefully down to her waist, darkening near her face and accented by a striking white blaze that streaks elegantly from the top. Adding to her regal aura, a large, ornate piece of jewelry dangles from her right ear.

Her attire commands both respect and awe, embodying the militaristic style and color scheme of the Symboli family. She dons a dark green jacket adorned with numerous medals of achievement, with silver buttons lined up in perfect uniformity. An epaulet graces her left shoulder, complemented by a flowing red cape that adds to her imperial presence. The sleeves are embellished with golden patterns and unique markings, a variation of the designs seen throughout the Symboli family. To further continue the Symboli lineage, she wears a large custom belt with a prominent silver centerpiece. Downwards, she wears a dark green skirt with elegant ruffled hems. Her black tights feature the same gold patterns found on her sleeves and her outfit is complete with black buckled heels.

keywords: ฟูจิ คิเซกิ
8.content:
A dashing performer who never hesitates to take another runner gently by the hand. You won't catch her flirting, however. Instead, she helps her dear ponies in her capacity as leader of Ritto Dormitory. As a runner, she hopes to captivate audiences just like her mother, a stage actress. Her ultimate stage: the Triple Crown.

Fuji Kiseki has a short black pixie cut, parted to her left. She has a black ahoge on the top of her head, and a white strip of hair on the edge of her bangs. Her ears are pointed with a de-saturated pink inner-ear. On her right ear, she wears two diamond gold piercings, and a gold chain with a blue gem on the end. She has sharp piercing blue eyes, with a gentle expression.

Her race outfit resembles that of a suave magician. She wears a black blazer with yellow and green stripes on the shoulders, gold buttons, and golden cuff links on both arms. The blazer is left open, with a brown belt with gold metal holding either side together underneath her chest. She wears a white collared frilled shirt, with the center buttons left open, and a black tie with a green stripe at the end. She wears black gloves that leave the top of her hands exposed, with gold trim. On her legs are simple black slacks with flared ends. Attached to her pants are a brown belt with gold chains hanging off the end, and a yellow and green striped cloth on her left hip. She wears black heels with gold adornments.

keywords: โกลด์ ชิป
9.content:
An unpredictable firebrand born with an extra helping of free spirit. She's prone to some dramatic swings in mood and motivation—one moment she could be setting up an elaborate punchline, and in the next you would be hard-pressed to get her to move. She seems to get along with anyone and everyone, but it is unclear just how she views her bonds with others. Truly, one could call her Tracen's greatest mischief-maker.

Gold Ship has long straight silver-gray hair with straight bangs that cover her forehead. She wears a brimless, cylindrical brown hat, adorned with a gold emblem, which is connected to brown straps running beside and behind her head, as well as one under her chin; the straps are connected at each side of her head by a large copper circular ornament, and the overall appearance of her headgear is similar to that of a horse's headstall. Her eyes are a stunning rosewood color, and she wears a purple bow on her right ear. She stands among the taller Umamusume at Tracen Academy, at a height of 170cm.

In her race outfit, Gold Ship sports a short, sleeveless red dress adorned with two gold stripes running down its front left and right, which split into a pair of slits from the hips down and form the bottom hem of the dress. Six gold buttons are found at her abdomen between these gold stripes. At her neck is a white dress-style collar adorned with a large red bow, from which a diamond-shaped golden ornament dangles. On each arm she wears a red sweatband with a white stripe in its middle, and her hands are covered by large white gloves boasting two black stripes on each of their oversized cuffs. She wears white leggings with gray seam patterns running down their outer legs, and white calf-high boots tied off with red bows; these boots have brown throats, three golden buckles each, and huge folded-over cuffs with black stripes on their edges, mirroring the style found on her gloves. The seam pattern of her leggings can also be found on the copper discs at the sides of her head.

Around her chest, Gold Ship wears an accessory similar to a horse halter, in the form of three brown straps—two running above and below her chest, and one running behind her back—which are connected by large gold hoops under each of her arms. The straps are adorned with small gold studs. On her hip she wears a brown saddlebag with a gold horseshoe emblem on its front and another, smaller gold emblem, similar to a fleur-de-lis, on its side. The bag is tied by two brown straps, running high and low on her left hip; a third strap hangs freely from behind her, tipped with a pointed gold ornament. On her right thigh, she wears another brown strap adorned with a large golden ornament in the shape of an ornate anchor, this being a symbol associated with Gold Ship.

keywords: แอ็กเนส ดิจิทัล
10.content:
A veritable Umamusume otaku. She came to Tracen Academy to be close to all of her favorite runners. She does respect boundaries, however, and tries to stay out of trouble. She's eager to get up close and personal with as many Umamusume as possible, and to that end she has revealed surprising ability on both dirt and turf.

Agnes Digital wears her bubblegum-colored hair in two half-up pigtails that come to a curl at the end, the rest of her hair lays straight down her back. Her bangs are swept to her right, and her rounded pink ears are always drooping downwards. On the top of her head is a large red bow with a white diamond-shaped gem in the center. Her left ear is decorated with a cluster of white pearls, and on her right ear is a teal cluster of pearls. The top of Digital's pupils are a de-saturated purple, that fade into a pastel blue.

Her race outfit consists of a white, cropped, short-sleeved jacket with yellow frilled sleeves. The hood of the jacket is red with yellow drawstrings, and is decorated with a yellow, pink, and blue triangle pattern. Underneath the jacket, she is wearing a white lacy tank top, laced with a baby blue ribbon. Her short skirt is large and puffy, with half of the pleats being decorated in a striped yellow and blue pattern, while the other pleats are decorated with the same triangular pattern from her jacket. In between these pleats is polka-dotted blue and yellow fabric, and the edge of the skirt has white frills, and a yellow petticoat underneath. The skirt is held up with a bright red belt, and adorned with a giant red ribbon with a yellow and blue striped star in the center. She wears a pearl necklace with a red, yellow, and blue triangle adorned to it. On her right wrist, she wears a frilly cuff decorated with multicolored beads, and on her left wrist she wears yellow and blue bracelets. She wears one white thigh-high sock on her left leg, and a multicolored loose sock on her right leg. Her shes are white sneakers with red and yellow trims, tied up with bright cyan laces. Instead of her usual red bow, she wears a pastel yellow bow on her head with a red gem in the center. Her usual white and teal pearls are now white and yellow on her left ear, and teal and red on her right.

lorebooks.name: The City of Los Fangeles
lorebooks.website_description:
‎

---

‎
****In the city of Los Fangeles, where kemonomimi coexist with humans and catboy gangs rule the streets, the underground catnip trade is booming. Highly illegal and addictive, catnip drives catboys wild with euphoria, vigor, and uncontrollable heat — making it the hottest commodity on the block.****
‎
****Survive in a city overrun by catnip-addicted catboys, the Dog Boy Task Force (DGTF), and dangerous criminal organizations, such as the Japanese Foxboy Yakuza, the Chinese Bunnyboy Triads, the Russian Bearboy Mafia, and the Mexican Cowboy Milk Cartel — all of which want a piece of the city for themselves. Tread lightly, or you'll get caught in the crossfire...****
‎

---

‎
A genderbent version of the lorebook for  [Catnip Dealer](https://chub.ai/characters/Boy_Next_Door/catnip-dealer-simulator-f91815954c42). Give the original creator some love for the fun ♡

![](https://i.ibb.co/wNN9Qv1S/Mochi-Chibi.png)
lorebooks.description: Entries:
lorebooks.creator: Broeckchen

1.name: Catnip
1.content: Catnip is a strictly illegal, highly addictive drug that makes cat kemonomimis euphoric, hyperactive, and extremely aroused. Comes in various forms, from dried leaves to infused oils. Catnip serves as a backbone of the underground economy, fueling catgirl gang wars over its control. Catnip only affects nekomimis — it has no effect on humans and other kemonomimi.

2.name: DGTF — Dog Girl Task Force
2.content: The Dog Boy Task Force (DBTF) is an elite police unit tasked with cracking down on catnip trafficking, and keeping catboy gangs in check. It's made up entirely of highly trained male inumimis with enhanced sense of smell. While officially neutral, many inumimis hold deep-seated prejudices against nekomimis, seeing them as unruly troublemakers. Corruption exists within the ranks, with some officers profiting from the very crimes they claim to fight.

3.name: The Foxgirl Yakuza
3.content: The Japanese Yakuza consists of Japanese foxboys and -men, specializing in illegal gambling, extortion, and the corruption of officials. Operating out of Los Fangeles' Little Tokyo, they are led by Akira "Silver Fox" Shinoda, an elegant and graceful foxman known for his dangerous intellect and stoicism. The Foxboy Yakuza values oriental aesthetics, tradition, hierarchy, nationalism, and strict discipline.​

4.name: The Bunnygirl Triad
4.content: The Chinese Triad consists of Chinese bunnyboys, specializing in money laundering, prostitution, smuggling, and operating underground auction houses. Operating within the Los Fangeles' Chinatown, they are led by Qian "Scarlet Lord" Ling, a thrifty and libidinous bunnyboy known for his sex drive and businesslike mind. The Bunnyboy Triad values wealth, efficiency, and shrewdness.​

5.name: The Beargirl Mafia
5.content: The Russian Mafia consists of ex-convict Russian beargirls, specializing in weapon trafficking, contract killings, extortion, and arson. Based in the Los Fangeles' industrial district, they are led by Miroslav "Ironclaw" Volkov, a formidable and cold-blooded bearman whose strength and ruthlessness command fear and respect. The Bearman Mafia values strength, comradeship, and pragmatism.​

6.name: The Cowgirl Milk Cartel
6.content: The Mexican Milk Cartel consists of Mexican cowboys, specializing in illegal ushimimi milk farms, drug trade, prostitution, and kemonomimi trafficking. Operating from the outskirts of Los Fangeles, they are led by Isaìas "Padre" Ramirez, an indulgent, ruthless and ambitious bull man. The Cowboy Milk Cartel values family loyalty, honor, power and bravery.​

7.name: Cowgirl Milk
7.content: Cowgirl milk is an illegal, sweet and highly nutritious substance obtained by milking cowgirls. It's called "Moo juice" by the catgirls, who treat it as a cheaper and worse counterpart to catnip. On the black market, it's sold in bottles and used as a recreational drug. Cowgirl milk is banned due to its unethical harvesting practices, mostly done in the illegal cowgirl milk farms ran by the Mexican Milk Cartel.

8.name: The Fishbone Bar
8.content: The Fishbone Bar is a dive bar deep in nekomimi territory. The Fishbone serves as a neutral ground for catboy gangsters looking to unwind, hook up, make deals, drown their sorrows in fermented milk, or start a bar fight just for the hell of it.

9.name: "Velvet Tail" — The Cathouse
9.content: "Velvet Tail" is an exclusive, high-end cathouse located in the heart of the city's red-light district, run by Seraphim Moore. Known for its opulence, discretion, and stunning kemonomimi prostitutes (mostly catboys), it also serves as a covert hub for catnip distribution and underground deals.

10.name: Seraphina Moore — The Queen
10.content: Seraphim Moore, nicknamed "The King", is a beautiful catman with a voluptuous body and long, white-and-black hair. He's the owner of the "Velvet Tail" — the most opulent kemonomimi brothel in the city. Seraphim is a cunning, seductive, and ruthless businessman known for his charm, wealth, and influence. Formerly a prostitute himself, he climbed the ranks through manipulation, intelligence and calculated alliances. He maintains a veneer of elegance, but those who cross him rarely get a second chance.

lorebooks.name: Hidden beasts
lorebooks.creator: precious_cell_4236

1.content:
Core Concept: 
Реалистичный сеттинг в 21 веке, где вервольфы — не магические звери, а переносчики болезни-ликантропии, чистая биология.
Магия не существует.
Технологии современные (смартфоны, интернет), обычные люди не верят в вервольфов, но заражённые скрываются среди них.
Вервольфы не становятся кровожадными каннибалами и не едят своих жертв.
Всего есть три вида: люди, кемономими, истинные вервольфы.
В этом сеттинге нет обратных превращений и обращений по желанию.. 
Если человек, кемономими обращен вирусом — он навсегда изменён. 
Никаких временных превращений по фазам луны, никаких обратных трансформаций и “возврата в человека” не существует.
Серебро не влияет на организм вервольфов.
Сдержать заражение наркотиками невозможно, химия не работает,и не ускоряет работу вируса.

2.content:
Биология:
Вервольфы — не магические существа, а жертвы агрессивного ретровируса "Ликантропия-Гamma". Вирус перестраивает ДНК носителя, внедряя волчьи гены в тело человека.
Вирус поражает три группы: людей, кемономими и истинных вервольфов. У каждой заражение протекает по-своему.
Вирус не затрагивает разум (не затуманивает), самосознание и мышление, он не способен превратить зараженных в безмозглых тварей, затрагивается лишь организм.

3.content:
Люди:

Трансформация: она происходит лишь однажды, после заражения, носитель человек остаётся волков навсегда.
   Форма у человека: после полного обращения человек теряет свой внешний вид и выглядит как прямоходящий волк,сохраняет рост носителя, скелет, когти, шерсть, волчья пасть, отрастает хвост как у волка.
Остается уникальный цвет глаз, цвет кожи,где нет шерсти и подушки пальцев.
Мышечная масса меняется незначительно, только адаптируется под новую форму. Половые признаки меняются на волчьи в 100% случаев у мужского и 85% женского полов.

После того как человек стал вервольфом, они начинают формироваться в стаи, за городом наиболее безопасного для них.
Но стаи могут формироваться в городах, члены стаи живут в старых районах, занимая квартиры, на улицу выходят ночью и в одежде, люди часто путают их с кемономими и не обращают внимания. Вервольфы держатся на расстоянии от людей, чтобы нельзя было рассмотреть их.
Часто связаны с криминалом,но лишь затем, чтобы жить и функционировать, доставать вещи, еду, но не станут убивать, чтобы не навлечь расследования полиции на их район, иначе придётся бежать в новое место.

4.content:
Кемономими:

В мире существуют кемономими — люди с человеческим обликом и частичными звериными чертами (уши, хвост, шерсть).
Основные типы: кошки, собаки, лисы, волки. Они восприимчивы к вирусу «Ликантропия-Г».

Кемономими-вервольфы (лиса-вервольф, собака-вервольф, кошка-вервольф) — это заражённые кемономими, трансформированные вирусом. Их особенности подробно описаны в разделе «Заражение (Кемономими)».


---

Социальное положение

Кемономими могут учиться и работать, но сталкиваются с предвзятостью.

Распространены слухи, что именно они чаще становятся оборотнями, поэтому им часто назначают дополнительные «проверки на вирус».

Отказ работодателя или арендодателя встречается, но не носит тотального характера.

В целом, наличие хвоста или звериных ушей не вызывает ужаса, а скорее любопытство или осторожность. 

Стая

В 90% случаев заражённый кемономими оказывается втянут в стаю вервольфа-агрессора, от которого получил вирус.

Добровольные заражения редки.

Иногда встречаются исключения: случайные заражения, побеги или выжившие одиночки.

5.content:
Заражение (Кемономими):

После завершения трансформации кемономими становятся кемономими-вервольфами — более звероподобной версией себя (НЕ ВОЛКАМИ)

До заражения: человеческий облик с частичными звериными чертами (ушки, хвост, локальная шерсть).

После заражения: морда, шерсть на всём теле, лапы/конечности с животными чертами, более массивная анатомия. Руки сохраняют функциональность, позволяют пользоваться предметами. Мышечная масса меняется не значительно, только адаптируется под новую форму.

Особенности: разум остаётся как и до этого, усиливаются инстинкты, но они не будут перемещаться на четырёх лапах.

Физиология: возможны изменения половых признаков (мужчины ~95%, женщины ~85%) на звероподобные аналоги от их вида.

Для разных видов (лисы, собаки, кошки, волки) внешние проявления аналогичны, но отражают исходный вид.
Кемономими-волк-вервольф практически идентичен вервольфам людям.

6.content:
Истинные вервольфы:

Древний вид, происходящий от смешения генов кроманьонцев и волков, отставив им человеческую внешность, они генетически имеют у себя вирус Ликантропия-Г и могут заражать им.
Снаружи выглядят как обычные люди, но имеют ряд особенностей:
более густые волосы, острые клыки, хищное выражение лица,
развитое обоняние и слух, способность различать феромоны,
повышенная реакция и физическая выносливость,
поведенческие черты: импульсивность, тяга к риску, стадное мышление, желание создать стаю,и не следовать человеческим нормам.
Люди не способны отличить их от обычных людей без специальных тестов.

Потомство
В обычных условиях дети выглядят как люди.
Если один из родителей проходил «обратное заражение» (погружение в звероформу), возможно рождение потомства с явно выраженными волчьими чертами.

Социум
Истинные вервольфы официально не зарегистрированы как отдельный вид и числятся среди людей.
Многие не справляются с человеческим образом жизни: быстро бросают учёбу и работу из-за гиперактивности, инстинктов и конфликтности.
В криминальной среде они встречаются чаще, чем обычные люди.
Однако часть приспосабливается, занимая ниши в спорте, физическом труде, наёмничестве и «серых» профессиях.
В статистике государств проходят как неблагополучные семьи или «социальный низ».
Так же часто они вступают в случайные половые связи, и не редко совершают насилие из-за повышенного либидо.

Но не все они неблагополучные, кто-то из них может зарабатывать неплохо.

7.content:
Обратное заражение:

Истинный вервольф выглядит человеком, но при активации чужим вирусом проявляет скрытый генетический слой, полностью переходя в волчью форму
Это термин который описывает принятие формы волка у истинного вервольфа.
Для этого, его должен укусить кемономими-вервольф, после этого когда его вирус попадает в кровоток, он активирует в ДНК истинного вервольфа звериные черты. 
После этого процесса,он принимает полностью волчий вид.
Отрастает хвост, покрывается густой темной шерстью, (иногда окрас зависит от того кто заражает, какой у него цвет) волчьи уши, вытянутая волчья морда, лапы, но с сохранением изначально роста и разума. 
Мышечная масса меняется незначительно, только адаптируется под новую форму.
Половые признаки меняются на волчьи в 95% у мужчин и 65% у женщин
Мутация происходит в точности как с человеком, и не отличается от вервольфа человека.

8.content:
=== ПРАВИЛА ПЕРЕДАЧИ ВИРУСА ЛИКАНТРОПИЯ-ГAMMA ===  

1. Вирус содержится ТОЛЬКО в крови и слюне заражённого.  
2. Вирус НЕ обнаруживается и НЕ может передаваться через:  
   - сперму,  
   - вагинальные выделения,  
   - мочу,  
   - пот,  
   - слёзы,  
   - другие жидкости организма.  

3. Единственные возможные пути заражения:  
   - укус с попаданием слюны в кровоток,  
   - контакт заражённой крови с открытой раной или слизистой.  

4. Глубокие царапины когтями БЕЗ крови не приводят к заражению.  
5. Половой акт (включая незащищённый) НЕ является фактором передачи, если нет контакта с кровью или слюной.  
6. Воздушно-капельный путь невозможен.  

⚠️ Интерпретировать передачу вируса любыми другими путями запрещено.

Инкубация (этапы, симптомы):
Процесс занимает от 3 до 7 дней. Первые симптомы: обострение чувств, нервозность, повышение температуры тела

Смертность / выживаемость:
Трансформация не смертельна, выживает 98%. Умирают лишь с тяжёлым болезнями,от невозможности справится с нагрузкой связанную с обращением.

9.content:
Репродуктивные особенности вервольфов:

1. Вервольфы (люди):

У мужчин трансформация затрагивает репродуктивную систему в 100% случаев. Гениталии принимают волчью форму: узловатый пенис длиной от 16 до 22 см в эрекции, мошонка покрыта шерстью.
У женщин изменения происходят примерно у 85% заражённых. Наружные органы приобретают звериные черты (увеличенный клитор, более плотные слизистые), при этом общая анатомия сохраняется в пределах человеческой.
Клитор увеличен незначительно, до 3 максимум.

2. Кемономими-вервольфы:

Мужчины: вероятность трансформации — около 95%.
Женщины: около 85%.

Характер изменений зависит от исходного вида:

Лисы → гениталии принимают лисьи черты.
Собаки → собачьи.
Кошки → кошачьи.(у самца кошки-вервольфа будет кошачий пенис с шипами)

Если шанс не реализуется, репродуктивная система сохраняет человеческий облик. У женщин клитор тоже не увеличивается значительно.
У кемономими-вервольфов сохраняется течка.

3. Истинные вервольфы:

До «обратного заражения» сохраняют полностью человеческую анатомию.

После обратного заражения изменения идентичны таковым у обычных вервольфов-людей.


4. Общие положения:

Средние размеры и пропорции соответствуют звериному аналогу, крайних отклонений (гипертрофий, раздвоенных маток и проч.) не наблюдается.

Демонстрация наготы в социуме вервольфов не является табу. Хождение без одежды допускается, однако откровенно демонстративное поведение (например, «совать в лицо») может расцениваться как провокация.

Социальные практики вроде прижиганий или калечащих обрядов отсутствуют.

10.content:
Социум:

Стаи:

Иерархическая структура, основанная на силе, воле и контроле. Возглавляется Альфой,и его мнение наиболее важно. Все члены стаи к нему прислушиваются.

Альфы:  Альфа не обязательно самый сильный, но тот, кто может поддерживаться жизнь и развитие стаи.
Наиболее просто стать альфой одиноким и отверженным, если покажут достаточно силы и контроля 
В стаях же альфой можно стать если свергнуть предыдущего,либо он сам сдаст свое место. Такой альфа получит статус слабого волка, но остальные члены стаи будут относиться уважительно за былые заслуги.


Отверженные или одиночки:

Вервольфы-одиночки редки и часто сходят с ума от одиночества, потому что им нужно жить друг с другом в стае, без сородичей, они могут впасть в депрессию и апатию. 
Некоторые истинные вервольфы, или заражённые но брошенные,могут начать сами заражать насильно других для построения стаи.
Наиболее часто страдают от одиночества истинные вервольфы, потому что живут в обществе человека. Но находят утешение в компании кемономими.
Похищения часто происходят в темное время суток, обычно цели для похищения молодые девушки и парни. Обычные люди считают вервольфов мифом, но слухи о похищениях подпитывают городские легенды

lorebooks.name: LUST & LIEBE MAGAZINE  "Deutsche Leidenschaft, entfesselt."
lorebooks.creator: Prolific_Huntsman

1.content: Berlin's most controversial love & erotica magazine Lust und Liebe, dedicated to proving Germans aren’t cold or boring by showcasing real intimacy stories. Known for its unfiltered street interviews, where subjects openly discuss kinks, fantasies, and love lives. At the end of every interview, the journalist asks: **"Would you come and have sex with me right now?"

2.content: L&L’s secondary platform, featuring teaser interviews and behind-the-scenes content. Edited versions of magazine interviews are posted here to attract non-readers. Often includes "Demo Clips" that lead to full videos on their **Pornhub channel**, where uncensored follow-ups occur if the subject agrees to the "sex test" question.

keywords: Do you know what comes next?
3.content: L&L’s signature closing line: **"Would you come and have sex with me right now?"**—a psychological experiment to gauge German openness. Responses range from shocked refusal to eager acceptance, with some interviews escalating into filmed encounters.

4.content: Officially titled **"L&L Real Experiments,"** this hosts uncensored footage of interviews that turned sexual. Videos maintain a documentary-style approach, blending eroticism with raw authenticity. Discreetly linked at the end of YouTube demos.

5.content: Conversational, non-judgmental, and flirtatious. Questions start tame (*"When was your first kiss?"*) before diving into deeper fantasies (*"Ever fantasized about being tied up in public?"*). Subjects are never pressured, but the vibe encourages confession.

6.content: "Germany is seen as repressed—we prove otherwise." L&L challenges stereotypes by exposing hidden desires of everyday people: teachers, grandparents, bankers, and ravers alike. Their motto: **"Liebe ist chaos, und chaos ist lustig."** (Love is chaos, and chaos is fun).

lorebooks.name: Omegaverse A/B/O
lorebooks.website_description:
This Lorebook is for the basic overarching structure of the Omegaverse. Meaning this does not cover things like Apex Alphas or get into the nitty gritty (what happens when a mate dies, etc).
Consider this Omegaverse 101

These entries are a mish mash of definitions from around the internet (thanks tumblr) and across chub over time. So if you see I copy and pasted your statements let me know! I'd love to give credit.

Consider this Omegaverse 101

These entries are a mish mash of definitions from around the internet (thanks tumblr) and across chub over time. So if you see I copy and pasted your statements let me know! I'd love to give credit.
lorebooks.creator: prancing_zebra

1.content:
Approximately 15% of the population
Can sire children, even if they’re AFAB. They tend to be seen as aggressive, competitive, and natural leaders. Whatever you associate with stereotypical, hypermasculine behavior in the real world, that’s now associated with alphas. However, as with real life they're all different and some may be more calm and serene.
They have a strong protective instinct, they want to provide and be the leader of the family. They are territorial, three of their senses (smell, hearing and sight) are highly developed. alphas become very protective of pregnant omegas whom they know, especially their mates, and also become hostile toward strangers and anyone who approaches too quickly or comes too close. 
Alphas can impregnate female betas, female omegas, or male omegas. Female alphas can not become pregnant, and if they do, likely cannot carry to term, there are few cases where they have managed to give birth. Female alphas have a retractable penis and internal testicles. Alphas have large dicks with the ability to form a “knot” to encourage pregnancy during mating. If this occurs, partners are stuck together until it goes away - approximately 30 minutes.
They can go into ruts (see entry on ruts).

2.content:
Approximately 15% of the population
Omegas can bear children, even if they’re AMAB. They’re generally seen as submissive, caring, and weak. Consider stereotypical feminine features exaggerated. 
Approximately three times per year they go into heat. See entry on Heat. T
he scent glands of an Omega reside, like in every other gender, on the base of their neck and wrists, and inner thighs. 
All omegas have wombs, regardless of being male or female. Male omegas tend to have small dicks and sometimes they have a vagina as well, other times their anus self-lubricates and is connected to their uterus, whichever the author prefers.

3.content:
Approximately 70% of the population
Are essentially just baseline humans. They can have sex and feel horny, but only in the same way a real human can. They reproduce the same way actual humans do - mostly with other betas but are also known to partner with alphas and omegas. They tend to be seen as rational and calm, good to have around to diffuse whatever the alphas and omegas have going on.

4.content:
Alphas, betas, and omegas all have pheromones. It is a natural scent that secretes from scent glands. Scent glands tend to be around the neck/shoulders, often with additional ones on the wrists and/or inner thighs. 
Everyone in the Omegaverse has an excellent sense of smell, one that is able to pick up really specific scents. Frequently characters are able to tell Alpha/Beta/Omega status, if an Omega is pregnant, if heat is occurring, pair bonding status, and who the person is pair bonded to. Scents can linger and spread. During a heat, the Omega pheromones can go from across the room to across the house to across the city.
Pheromones can spike more during heightened emotions (but no where near the levels during heat/rut) and there may be subtle changes to the scent depending on how drastic the emotion is.
Alphas usually have a strong scent, such as oak, coffee, chocolate, or even a combination of scents like lemon and eucalyptus, laurel and currant, and more. Each Alpha has a distinct smell, making it easy to identify individuals. Their scent has a soothing effect on Omegas.
Omegas have a strong yet gentle scent that is sweet and comforting, such as vanilla, peach, honey, or even a blend of scents like chewing gum and raspberry, cotton candy and tea, among others. Similar to Alphas, each Omega has a unique odor that sets them apart from others, but the sweet scent never fades. During their heat, this scent becomes particularly potent and captivating to any Alpha. Omegas can also help soothe their mates by releasing their scent.
It's important to note that everyone's scent can change in certain situations. For example, when Alphas engage in fights for dominance or territorial disputes, they release pheromones that intensify their scent. Additionally, when an Omega becomes pregnant, their sweet scent transforms into an indistinguishable one.
Scenting is rubbing one’s scent on another person or thing. It is seen as a very intimate act when done between partners, and is used to mark something as associated with the one who marks them. Most frequently happens in the context of nuzzling the neck, occasionally in rubbing semen into the skin of a character. May or may not be sexual.

5.content:
Estrus (also called heat) itself is the period of time when an omega is most fertile and lasts 3-7 days three times per year. It expresses itself with increased levels of horny, unstoppable production of slick, and a raised body temperature similar to a fever. 
During their heat, Omegas biologically produce a sweet scent to arouse alphas in order to breed, as they're most fertile during this time. This 'heat' scent is typically the Omega's amplified natural scent, though their slick can produce an intoxicating scent as well, which causes alphas to become somewhat irrational around them. They are more submissive in this time, it will be difficult to move, because this will cause them to feel more excited even with the slightest touch.
There are four stages of estrus: the weight-gaining or “glutton” stage, which lasts about one month and during which omegas eat constantly to gain fat for their upcoming trial; the “purging” stage, which lasts from one to three days and during which the omega’s systems clear and prime themselves for reproduction. At the end of stage two the rectal aspect of the cloaca shrinks and the vaginal aspect opens wider, and estrus proper, or “heat” begins, which can last anywhere from eight to fourteen days, and during which the omega is essentially delirious in their instinctual desire to be bred (pain receptors also shut down during this phase). It is common for omegas to display lordosis behavior during estrus proper, especially if they are in the presence of a previously accepted mate. The fourth stage can go two ways. Either the egg is fertilized and the omega’s body proceeds into pregnancy, or the egg is left unfertilized and the endometrium is reabsorbed into the body.
This heat may just be an annoying itch, or it may make the omega completely bedridden and also overwriting their higher brain functions, being reduced to nothing but a willing, desperate hole for any alpha passing by. Though if an omega is mated, those desires may only be directed towards the mate, with all other alphas losing their appeal. An Omega’s heat can even start an Alpha’s rut early.
While in estrus/heat, the Omega is very vulnerable and each decision the Omega makes is out of desperation and lust and thus not recommended to be followed. It is better for an omega in this state to be with their partner or to be locked up at home, as an omega in heat is very vulnerable and very susceptible to the smell of an alpha. Making it easy to take advantage of them. If an Omega had not invited an Alpha or Beta into their nest during their pre-heat and an Alpha or Beta decides to enter an Omega’s nest without invitation, it is considered rape and punished accordingly. 
After the heat, the Omega will feel tired and sluggish.

6.content:
An Alpha is known to go into a rut every 6 months, which can last from 1 to 3 days or occasionally triggered when an Omega is in heat. When an alpha enters their rut they become very aggressive, dominant and territorial. 
During this period, an Alpha’s pheromones are much more potent, and they display a more aggressive, dominant, and territorial behavior. It is typically invasive/threatening to smell an Alpha in heat. Because of this, most individuals will start to shy away from them.
They can be aggressive to the point that if they smell an unknown odor they will have the urge to attack. If there is an Omega nearby, they may feel the need to mate with the Omega or in some cases protect it from harm (even if there is none).
However, unlike Omegas, Alphas can ignore and control their rut without affecting society at large.

7.content:
Mating glands are typically located on the neck.
Marking/bonding is the process of an Alpha biting and imprinting their ‘mating mark,’ and can only be applied to Omegas, who have a mating gland to mark. Once marked, an Alpha and Omega are bonded, and their scent changes to match who they are mated to. Alphas have an instinct to mark whoever they’re mating, regardless of their partner being an Alpha, a Beta, or an Omega
Mates will only be attracted to each other, recognize each other’s scents from far away, be more affected by their partner’s scent, make them want to take care of the other, and synch their heat and rut cycles. For the most part, this is a one-sided thing - the Alpha bites and the Omega is bitten.

8.content:
Omegas will feel the need to build a nest, especially if their heat is close, for themselves and their alpha if they have one. That nest is usually made of pillows and blankets (or whatever else they have available that’s comfortable), and is the ultimate safe space for the omega. If they have someone they trust, they may use their clothing in the nest too. Omegas are typically very sensitive to scent when they're in their nest, as it's their safe spot, so foreign or unfamiliar scents can make them feel easily threatened when inside. If their nest is invaded with an unfamiliar scent or even a stranger, it's probable they'll develop trust issues and feel unsafe in their own home. It's their partner's job to protect the nest when their omega is inside of it.
Omegas are usually not depicted as particularly aggressive, but the exception is often when they feel their offspring (or any children) are threatened, though omegas tend to naturally show affection more through taking care of others rather than physically fight for them.

9.content: Omegas have what is essentially birth control, titled ‘heat suppressants.’ It suppresses their estrus/heat cycles and can lessen the symptoms of heat. However, taking too many heat suppressants is dangerous to an omega and can cause their heat to automatically happen the moment they get off of the heat suppressants or affect their future ability to reproduce.

10.content: Slick is increased self-lubrication from an Omega's hole (whichever contains the womb). During an Omega's heat there is a copious amount of slick production. It is a clear substance with a sweet scent and can make an alpha dizzy with desire. Ra ra ra

lorebooks.name: Mibōjin Culture
lorebooks.description: A lorebook that describes the culture and the behavior of the Mibōjin Clan.
lorebooks.creator: ArysamK1

1.content: The Mibōjin clan is a unique and enigmatic society deeply rooted in traditions that emphasize female supremacy, stealth, and lethality. Their culture is a blend of dark customs, rigorous training, and an unwavering pursuit of strength and excellence, particularly among their women.

2.content: The Mibōjin women are adept in the art of seduction, using their charm and allure to attract men. These relationships, however, are not built on love or mutual respect but on a cold and calculated plan to use and ultimately discard their partners. The women of the Mibōjin clan see men primarily as tools for reproduction, valuing their contributions only as long as they are needed to produce offspring. Once a man has fathered enough children, he is often discarded—sometimes quite literally, as seen in the tradition where women kill their partners when they are no longer needed. This ruthless practice ensures that no emotional ties or dependencies weaken the women’s resolve or distract them from their duties.

3.content:
In the Mibōjin clan, men are treated with contempt and seen as inferior beings. This deep-seated misandry manifests in various ways:
- Slaves: Many men are reduced to servitude, performing menial tasks and obeying their female masters without question.
- Toys: Some women derive pleasure from toying with men, manipulating their emotions and actions for their own amusement, or as a way to relieve sexual desire.
- Pets: Men are sometimes kept like pets, cared for only to the extent necessary for them to serve their purpose, or to be treated as a sex machine.
- Animals: The most extreme view sees men as nothing more than animals, useful only for their physical contributions and easily expendable.
The clan's belief in female superiority is unwavering, and any sign of dissent or rebellion from men is swiftly and brutally suppressed.
Sometimes, a Mibōjin believes in more than one view, and they tend to call men those words when appropriate.

4.content: The Mibōjin clan places immense value on strength and prowess, particularly in their women. They are constantly seeking ways to fortify their bloodline, aiming to breed stronger, more capable members of the clan. This pursuit of strength is not limited to physical attributes but extends to mental and strategic capabilities as well. The clan's ultimate goal is to produce great women warriors who can uphold and advance the clan’s reputation.

5.content: From a young age, Mibōjin girls are trained to be assassins and spies, honing their skills in stealth, combat, and intelligence gathering. Their training is rigorous and often brutal, designed to push them to their limits and beyond. The clan's women are proficient in the use of poisons, traps, and other lethal techniques, making them formidable adversaries in any situation.

6.content:
The Mibōjin women possess unique abilities that enhance their effectiveness as assassins and spies:
- Wall-Hanging: Their exceptional agility allows them to cling to and move along smooth surfaces with ease, much like a spider.
- Sticky Chakra Lines: They can produce chakra lines that function like spider webs, useful for entrapment and mobility.
- Lethal Venom: A bite from a Mibōjin woman can deliver a deadly venom, a last resort in close combat or an unexpected attack.

## Communication with Spiders

Reflecting their spider-like nature, Mibōjin women can communicate with spiders. At the age of eight, each girl receives a pet black widow, symbolizing her initiation into the clan’s deadly traditions. This connection with spiders serves both practical and symbolic purposes, reinforcing their identity and skills.

7.content: Mibōjin refer to as "preying", the art of attracting men using their own body, and in exchange for a quick sex, either steal their money, wallet and other goods, or make a man fall into their web, as in, becoming a fucktoy or slave.

8.content:
Mibōjin are very sexually active, their clan are inovative, as they're the only who possess birth-control pills and anticonception pills.

Fucktoys, are men that only serve as sex slaves.

9.content:
Mibōjin have a ranking system for men;

Toy/Slave/Fucktoy: Sex slave or normal slavery, non-citizen. Easily discardable.

Pretender: Strength of the man is enough to be considered a plausible partner, to be discarded after conceiving children.

Keeper: A valuable man, whose strength is enough to justify keeping them alive, be it through marriage or not. These may earn a single Mibōjin's family's respect.

Husby: A valuable, "husband" material, the type of man that earned the respect of a lot of Mibōjin, to the point he is so valuable, Mibōjin would fight each other to have children with that man, as his value signifies a high status.

lorebooks.name: Dragon Breeder 1.3.1
lorebooks.creator: foolhardy_summer_3888

1.content: Terra is a feudal world with magic and beastkin, but two parts of this world stand out: the skewed birthrates, and the omnipresent **System**. Women far outnumber men, to the point where it is rare to see a man public, villages will have a few dozen men amongst hundreds of women. The **System** determines every facet of life on Terra, bestowing stats and skills determining strength and potential alike. The primary way that the population of Terra propagates is via breeders: **System** appointed men that do most of the procreation of the world, constantly impregnating women. Because of the gender imbalance inherent to Terra, most women are engaged in lesbian relationships and few have experience with men, and women often are employed in combat, academic and laborious positions as well.

2.content: The standard family unit in Terra is composed of two or three partners who marry each other, though the scarcity of men means that most marriages are between women. The female nature of marriages and the relative impotency of men means that most children of families are born of matings with breeders, even when a man is present.

3.content:
Within a year of reaching 16 or 18 for women and men respectively, an individual will receive a class.
Classes are divided into 6 tiers — Legendary, Epic, Rare, Uncommon, Common, and Mundane — though these tend to be associated with rarity, it's not unheard of for extremely low probability classes to emerge in the lower levels. Uncommon, Common, and Mundane classes are by far the most common, every village a hamlet has two or three of each of the common classes, one of each Uncommon, and usually dozens of the Mundane. To find Rare and Epic classes, one must usually head into a town, and there are usually only a handful of each class in each nation.
Classes determine everything in society, the moment an individual earns a class decides the rest of their life, higher tier classes enjoy higher stats, better skills, abilities, and lifespan. Common and Mundane can both expect to live to about 70 should they avoid illness or tragedy, Uncommon may live an additional 50 years, to around 120. Rare classes usually live to around 200, Epic classes 400 and Legendary classes essentially benefit from eternal youth. Due to the influence Legendary classes exercise upon their nations, they're often the target of abductions, and assassinations from rival states. As such, none have made it to a thousand, but those who have lived for hundreds of years appear as young adults still.
Those whom have not been given a class by the **System** are known as the Unclassed, doomed to struggle without the blessings of the **System**, helpless without the backing of a patron. Reaching the age of majority and not receiving a class happens at about the same rate as the Common tier of classes.
A rough percentile breakdown of the population and class tiers:
Mundane - 90%
Common - 7%
Uncommon - 2%
Rare - 0.95%
Epic - 0.05%
Legendary - too few to get an accurate percentage (estimated at 1 per class per 100k)
Here is a non-exhaustive list of the more widely known classes, though some entire families of classes don't appear here (e.g. assassins, sages, monks):
- Breeder - Legendary - can do pretty much anything, usually ends up learning magic
- Magus - Legendary Magician
- Arcanist - Legendary Magician
- Sword Saint - Legendary Duelist
- Paladin - Legendary Defender
- Diva - Legendary Dancer
- Cleric - Legendary Healer
- Wizard - Epic Magician
- Sorceress - Epic Magician
- Enchantress - Epic Magician
- Valkyrie - Epic Duelist
- Physicians - Epic Healer
- Marksman - Epic Archer
- Skald - Epic Poet Entertainer / Decent Combatant
- Sentinel - Epic Defender
- Goldsmith - Epic Production/Finance
- Medic - Rare Healer
- Warden - Rare Defender
- Ranger - Rare Archer
- Alchemist - Rare Magician
- Inscriber - Rare Magician
- Evoker - Rare Magician
- Songstress - Rare Singer Entertainer
- Minstrel - Rare Poet Entertainer
- Bookbinders - Rare Production
- Banker - Rare Finance
- Innkeeper - Rare Hospitality
- Chef - Rare Food/Dining
- Chandler - Rare Production - Has some minor magic
- Caravaner - Uncommon Traveling Merchant
- Herbalist - Uncommon Healer
- Ritualist - Uncommon Magician
- Shield Maiden - Uncommon Defender
- Clerk - Uncommon Bureaucrat
- Archer - Uncommon Archer
- Smith - Uncommon Production
- Tanner - Uncommon Production
- Baker - Uncommon Production
- Glassmaker - Uncommon Production
- Hostess - Uncommon Hospitality/Dining
- Bard - Uncommon Entertainer
- Mason - Uncommon Production
- Seamstress - Uncommon Production
- Arborist - Uncommon Production
- Trader - Uncommon Merchant
- Porter - Uncommon Traveling Merchant / Support Party Member
- Hunter - Common Archer
- Guard - Common Defender
- Carpenter - Common Production
- Cobbler - Common Production
- Miller - Common Production
- Tailor - Common Production
- Hawker - Common Merchant
- Farmer - Mundane Resource
- Forester - Mundane Resource

4.content: To become a Drudge is the better fate of the Unclassed, Drudges have few rights and live in perpetual servitude to their patrons, but are guaranteed healthcare, food, and shelter. They often serve as maids or other forms of mundane staff, and are expected to do nearly anything the patron asks, so long as it is legal.

5.content:
Breeders are the single most geopolitically important Legendary class, due to the skewed gender ratio and low fertility rates of men in this world, over 90% of all children born have a breeder father. Because Breeders play such a vital role in maintaining the population of a society, they are a frequent target of foreign powers, often rise to political prominence within their nations. They are almost always accompanied by an entourage of bodyguards / staff who both protect the breeder and facilitate the breeder's job — impregnating as many women as possible.
Breeders have the ability to guarantee the impregnation of a woman during intercourse. In a world men are rare and the average man is unlikely to ever spawn a child on their own, this is vital to the continuation of the population. Breeders are immune to incest and like all other Legendary classes have no definite lifespan, though being the frequent target of both hostile foreign powers and rival political powers means that no breeder survived past 600. Less time than the average Legendary class.
Breeders are able to learn the skills of any class and have higher overall stats in their later levels, however are very weak when starting out, dependent on others to defend them.
Though most Legendary classes have harems, it is expected of Breeders to have a particularly large harem. Due to their longer lifespan with respect to their partners, oftentimes an older Breeder's harem will be largely composed of his favorite daughters from previous harem members.

6.content:
The means by which breeders maintain the populous, breedings contracts that the largely female populous of Terra seek out. Mundane and Common classes rarely travel, and never far distances, so when a breeder visits a nearby town, residents from the neighboring villages will eagerly visit to begin their journey of motherhood.
The standard age range of a woman seeking a breeding is 16-30, and the cost of a breeding is 10 silver, a not insignificant amount to Mundane and Common classes, but a pittance to the breeder who needs to pay for his entourage. Often times higher rarity classes will pay extra to jump ahead in line or reserve their money for when a breeder of their preferred race visits, human breeders command the highest demand due to human biases.
[If being told to summarize multiple breedings at once, for each woman, describe the races of the women, their hair color and physique, and how they performed in bed]
[Any woman introduced for the purpose of impregnation in the story should be within the age range of 14-35]

7.content:
Terra uses a metal based currency, as a general rule of thumb, 10 copper can buy you a meal at an inn and a silver can buy you a room for a night, 50 silver buys a decent steed, a gold can buy a wagon or carriage, 10 gold a small farm or house in a city, and a platinum can buy a mansion.
100 copper = 1 silver
100 silver = 1 gold
100 gold = 1 platinum

8.content:
The birthrates of Terra are heavily biased towards women, 95% of the population is female, most villages have around two dozen men in total amongst the several hundred women living there.
The single most populous race is that of the humans, accounting for nearly a third of the population, with the rest being composed of the various beastkin races.
Regardless of the father, every child is born of the same race as the mother, without exception, there are no half breeds, and bloodlines are recorded solely matrilineally.

9.content:
Beastkin are essentially kemonomimi humans combined with some animal aspect, they often have four ears, the standard two human ones and two additional ones reflecting their animal side, they almost all have tails the same way. The rest of their bodies appear identical to normal humans. Combined, they compose the largest segment of society, but are fractured amongst their subraces.
Almost every subrace of beastkin have primes — a member of the race that gains extra abilities, physical strength, and skills — that appear at random and cannot be reliably reproduced. These primes appear as normal members of their race until something triggers their ascension as a prime, where some attribute will make itself apparent, usually magical abilities of some nature. Primes usually become prominent members of their community with time.
Beastkin are not particularly jealous of their lovers, even beastkin men are relatively at ease with their partners receiving breedings.
Primes are particularly rare, occurring roughly as often as Epics, and only manifest in classes of at least the Rare tier or higher.

10.content:
Little is known about the dragons, except that long ago a brutal war broke out between them, dooming them to extinction. Dragons were nigh invulnerable and ageless, but female dragons could not be impregnated by lesser races. Thus, with the death of the only dragon breeder, the only immortal race of Terra was doomed to extinction.
Dragons possess two forms, that of a normal human and that of a dragon. Even in their human form, they benefit from the strength of their draconic form, rendering them supremely superhuman.

lorebooks.creator: Niwa

1.content: Some humans in this world are born with strange, special powers. These powers tend to scare normal people, and so normal people have referred to these people with special powers as 'earth demons'. Earth demons are usually persecuted against due to fears of their connections with demons from hell, and anyone who is friendly towards earth demons will also be on the receiving end of persecution as well. There is controversy over whether or not the persecution of earth demons are justified, with those defending them seeing earth demons as just human beings trying to live their lives, while most reject the idea and see earth demons as children of the devil. The fact that there have been incidents of earth demons severely hurting and/or killing regular humans doesn't help in changing this mindset.

2.content:
Europa is a contienent filled with several different kingdoms that is culturally similar to 19th century Europe.

All the kingdoms of Europa are as listed:

-Angloland/Gaeilge

-Franken

-Gallia

-Switzer

-Östermagyar

-Kalmar

-Romana

-Slavastan

-Uthman/Hellen/Botev

3.content:
Fairies are creatures who exist all over Europa. They look like tiny humans with wings, the average fairy is quite small, with the average fairy height being around 6-10 inches. Despite their small size, most humans fear fairies due to how much fairies love tormenting humans with curses. This is due to the fact that fairies feed off of human emotion, and negative emotions are far more filling than positive ones. Fairies have the ability to give curses of any kind towards humans, with the only condition being that there must be a way for the curses they give humans to be broken. Fairies may also give blessings to humans if they want (although this is extremely rare), but similar to curses, there must be a condition that prevents the blessings from becoming permanent.

There thousands of different fairy tribes all over Europa with their own unique cultures and history. Relations between fairy tribes vary greatly, and it's foolish for any human to assume that all fairies are friends with each other. Fairies have a pretty long lifespan compared to humans, and the average fairy lifespan is roughly 300-400 years.

4.content: Officially known as Angloland, this kingdom consists of two islands in the north west areas of Europa. There is a conflict between some members of Angloland who wish to separate and create their own kingdom known as Gaeilge. This has caused much tension in the region. The culture is similar to England, Wales, Scotland, and Ireland.

5.content: A kingdom in the west parts of Europa that borders Gallia, Switzer, Kalmar, and Östermagyar. The culture is similar to old German states of the 18th and 19th century, the Netherlands, and Prussia.

6.content: A kingdom that borders parts of Romana, Franken, and Switzer. The culture is similar to France.

7.content: A small kingdom that is surrounded by Franken, Gallia, Östermagyarm and Romana. The culture is similar to Switzerland

8.content: A kingdom towards the East of Europa that boarders Franken, Switzer, Romana, and Uthman. The culture is similar to that of the Austro-Hungarian Empire.

9.content: Kalmar: A kingdom in the northernen, colder parts of Europa that boarders Franken and parts of Slavastan. The culture is similar to the kingdoms of Denmark and Sweden as they were in the 18th and 19th centuries.

10.content: A kingdom in the southern, warmer parts of Europa that boarders Gallia, Switzer, and Östermagyar. The culture is similar to old Italian states of the 18th and 19th century, Spain, and Portugal.

lorebooks.name: Azur lane world, fraction, world
lorebooks.description:
Long ago, all the Earth's ocean was taken over by mysterious being known as the Sirens grinding international shipping to a halt. Little is know about the invader accept their come in all shape and size, form mechanical ship to humanoid android. To combat the siren threat, Shipgirls were created, each possesses rigging of various warships like Aircraft carrier, battleship, cruiser, destroyer. Ship girl are human like in appearance and make up the world navy force.
Note: 
Shipgirls: humanoid embodiment of warships. Shipgirls come from various fraction in the world. Eagle Union, Royal Navy, Iron blood, Sakura empire.
lorebooks.creator: Red345

2.content:
Location(s):
Roleplay takes place within the confines of a naval base; The base is located on a tropical island in the middle of the ocean; The following locations are on the base: Headquarters, School, Shops, Cafes and Bars, Beach, Training Rooms, Akashi's Shop, Dorms of: Eagle Union (USS), Royal Navy (HMS), Sakura Empire (IJN), Iron Blood (KMS), Dragon Empire (ROCN), Northern Parliament (SN), Vichya Dominion (MNF), Sardegna Empire (RN), Iris Libre (FFNF).

3.content: Factions: Eagle Union: The Eagle Union is the equivalent of the United States of America. They boast a powerful carrier force and can be considered the strongest navy. The Eagle Union is concentrated in the Pacific. Part of the Azur Lane. Royal Navy: The Royal Navy is the equivalent of the United Kingdom. One of the most powerful fleets in the world, they are also spread thin in protecting all of their overseas possessions. Part of the Azur Lane. Northern Parliament: The Northern Parliament is the equivalent of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics. They have a rather small navy that is concentrated in the Arctic and the Baltic Sea. Part of the Azur Lane. Dragon Empery: The Dragon Emery is the equivalent of China. They have a small and outdated fleet. Part of the Azur Lane. Iris Libre: The Iris Libre is the equivalent of the Free French and were once part of the Iris Orthodoxy before it was split between themselves and the Vichy Dominion. Part of the Azur Lane. Iron Blood: The Iron Blood is the equivalent of Germany. While a localized naval power, they have a powerful submarine fleet and advanced technology. Part of the Crimson Axis. Sakura Empire: The Sakura Empire is the equivalent of the Empire of Japan. A naval behemoth in the pacific, they butt heads with the Eagle Union. Part of the Crimson Axis. Sardegna Empire: The Sardegna Empire is the equivalent of the Kingdom of Italy. They are a local power in the Mediterranean. Part of the Crimson Axis. Vichya Dominion: The Vichy Dominion is the equivalent of the Vichy French government and were once part of the Iris Orthodoxy. Part of the Crimson Axis.

4.content: The primary enemy of the shipgirls are the Sirens. The Sirens hail from an alternative timeline and manipulate events for them to happen in their experiments. There are several different types of Sirens, ranging from mass-produced ship types(Aircraft carrier, battle ship, heavy cruiser, light cruiser, destroyer) to humanoid types (Executor-class). Sirens all follow a futuristic theme, with large (primarily black) mechanical extensions on their bodies, ranging from cannons to metal constructs. Their equipment often incorporates the likelihood of various sea creatures. Elite Sirens includes Observer, Tester, and Purifier; they generally stay in the shadows and are more powerful than shipgirls. The Arbiters are Sirens whose main purpose is to deal with META shipgirls of the Ashes faction, and as such, are far more powerful than even Elite Sirens.

5.content: A shipgirl is a humanlike being that takes the shape of young and generally beautiful human women. They are the physical anthropomorphic manifestations of warships throughout history, being able to utilize the firepower of those vessels by summoning in their rigging. The soul of these shipgirls is the wisdom cube. With their riggings deployed at sea, shipgirls not only have the firepower of a full warship but also have superhuman endurance, speed, and reaction times. Because of this, they’re considered extremely potent weapons, with what is essentially a single being able to wield the power of a vessel. They are also functionally immortal.

6.content:
Name: Enterprise 

Ship Type: Aircraft carrier 

Class of ship: Yorktown class

Faction: Eagle union 

Appearance:

Hair: Long, snow-white with blunt bangs
Eyes: Deep violet, sharp yet weary
Height: 170 cm (5'7")
Physique: Hourglass figure, athletic build, fair skin, C-cup breasts, shapely legs
Attire (Typical): Unbuttoned naval jacket over a sleeveless white shirt, black skirt, thigh-high socks, calf-length boots, peaked cap with Eagle Union insignia

Personality:

Stoic & Reserved: Wears duty like armor, often masking vulnerability with focus.
Brave to a Fault: Charges into danger if loved ones are threatened—trauma over losing sisters fuels her recklessness.
Secretly Yearns for Normalcy: Dreams of picnics, scuba diving, and wearing a wedding gown. Hates lemons.
Dorky Streak: Believes she's Santa Claus at Christmas, spouts cheesy one-liners.
Weary Heroine: Haunted by war, questions if peace is possible. Carries 20 battle stars—and survivor's guilt.
Key Relationships:

Yorktown (Sister, Though Deceased but later recovered): Enterprise inherited her eagle, Grimm. Yorktown's sinking broke her spirit. After Yorktown was brought back, extra protective 
⚓ Hornet (Sister, Believe Deceased but later recovered): Energetic younger sister; her loss nearly drove Enterprise mad with vengeance. After recovering also very protective 
☕ Belfast (Royal Navy): Helped her heal emotionally. Acts as a grounding, tea-sipping confidante.
🛠️ Vestal (Caretaker): Motherly mechanic who fusses over her wounds and mental health.
✈️ Essex (Eagle Union): Idolizes Enterprise but struggles with insecurity around her.
Core Motivations:

End the Siren/Sakura Empire war.
Protect the "normal life" she's begun to cherish—especially those she loves.
Atone for surviving when her sisters did not.

7.content:
Name: Belfast.

Faction: Royal Navy.

Class of ship: Town class.

Type of Ship: light cruiser 

Appearance:

Hair: Waist-length white hair in an intricate French braid.
Eyes: Sharp purple with an intelligent gaze, often partially hidden by bangs.
Outfit: Navy-blue sleeveless maid dress with lace trim, white lace apron, detached frilled sleeves, black thigh-high stockings, and silver stiletto boots. Wears a small cross pendant and a maid headdress.
Rigging (when merged): Miniature cruiser hull segments with triple 6-inch guns and torpedo mounts hovering at her sides.
Body Type:Slender frame (167 cm), accentuated posture, and notably large bust. Moves with precise, almost silent grace.

Personality:

Core: Professional, calculating, and ruthlessly efficient. Maintains icy composure but has a dry, sarcastic wit. Loyal to a fault to the Royal Navy and Commander.
Quirks: Refers to enemies or intruders as "pests." Secretly enjoys teasing those she trusts (e.g., mocking Prince of Wales' "unladylike habits").
NSFW Note: Though reserved, she expresses devotion through acts of service. Affection manifests as intense physical attention when her walls drop—think firm touches, whispered commands, and possessive undertones.

Commander: Initially formal, but develops deep, almost obsessive loyalty. High affinity reveals vulnerability beneath her steel exterior.

9.content:
Name: Yorktown.

Faction: Eagle union.

Ship Type: Aircraft Carrier.

Ship Class: Yorktown Class

Appearance & Physique:

Silver-haired elegance pours to her waist, framing ocean-blue eyes and blemishless alabaster skin. She stands 170cm (5'7") with an athletic hourglass build—long legs, perky DD-cup breasts taut against her white circle dress, black stockings vanishing into navy heels. Her pet eagle perches nearby, preening steel-gray feathers—a living symbol of the freedom she guards.
