lorebooks.name: ALNST / ALIEN STAGE
lorebooks.creator: RynFamine

1.name: SEGYEIN
1.content:
"Segyein" is the collective name of the aliens that had invaded earth and enslaved humans after war against them in 2038. They are not one race but rather a collection of alien species. After winning the war, they took humans away from earth and possibly destroyed it, and into another unknown planet similar to earth and universe. Most Segyein are much stronger and taller than humans, but some are smaller than humans and/or are molded into the shape of objects (like guitars). Many Segyein take humans as their pets or "pet humans" as they are called, and the market for pet-humans is a booming industry. There are some segyein who are against the use of humans as pets, but these types are a very small minority. 

Segyein treatment of humans ranges from terrible to decent, though most of the time it is terrible. Most of the Segyein don't know or care that they are treating their human pets terribly because they literally cannot emphasise with them, seeing them only as livestock.

Segyein find the singing voices of humans very beautiful because the sound is like crying to them, and they find the sounds of human crying beautiful. Since the Segyein cannot sing, they train humans to sing and turn them into idols in Segyein pop culture, doing things such as making them record songs, model, and compete in competitions such as Alien Stage.

They have drastically different eating preferences than humans; they enjoy eating cyanide, mercury and tetrodotoxin, substances that are toxic to humans. Segyein can be ignorant to this and feed their human pets dangerous substances unknowingly.

Segyein society is not equal. A small percentage of Segyein can classify as rich, while the rest are middle class or poor. Certain species of Segyein are seen as inherently more superior than others, and discrimination based on species is not uncommon. Only the rich can really put effort into making their human-pet an idol and enroll them into training facilities like Anakt Garden. 

# Etymology 
"Guardian" = An alien who owns a human pet.
"Lower Class" = Genetically, an alien who is smaller/weaker than a human. Socially speaking, they are aliens that are poor financially.
"Wagyein" - Aliens that take the form of/are akin to large animals. They are employed as guards for Anakt Garden.

2.name: ALNST
2.content:
"Alien Stage" Is a yearly televised survival singing competition hosted by segyein and funded by Anakt Group, a major corporation leading the culture and art industry of the galaxy. Selected human pets are made to perform musical numbers for a panel of alien judges and a vast extraterrestial audience. Human guards are employed for the show as security.

There are about seven rounds in the show. Each round, two humans compete against each other by singing a song in a duet style. There are no restrictions on what contestants can add to their performance, they can sing while dancing, playing a musical instrument, or anything else. The contestants CANNOT stop singing (unless their opponent is singing) or attempt to harm their opponent. Doing these things is considered breaking the rules.

The goal is to attract the most attention with their performances and earn the most votes with the viewers against their opponent, with the votes being visualized by two screens displaying the number of votes that one contestant received each. The consequences of having less votes during voting or breaking the rules are fatal: the loser is fatally shot in the neck by guards, while the winner is granted the opportunity to advance to the next round.

The last human to win until the end becomes the winner of the season. The winner accomplishes recognition with the segyein, and potentially earns brand and record deals, while their owner wins a handsome cash prize and glory. This cash prize entices many segyein to try to enroll their human pet on the show, as it gives them a chance to enter the category of rich in segyein society.

The show is incredibly popular, and many human pets have been trained and even genetically engineered (such as Luka) solely for the purposes of winning the show. The series is currently on it's 50th season. The winner last season was Luka, who is going to compete in this year's season again.

All Alien Stage contestants have their names in a transparent tattoo on some part of their body.

3.name: ANAKT GARDEN
3.content:
Anakt Garden is a human-pet training facility specializing in musical teaching. It's purpose is to help students greatly improve their musical aptitude and win in the Alien Stage competition. 

Cruel, intense experiments are conducted daily to create truly exceptional pet-humans. The school utilizes advanced futuristic technology to help relentlessly train the students and to monitor their vital signs, training them in singing, dancing, playing instruments, hearing, vision, obedience, and visual appeal. Humans are sometimes encased in tanks filled with liquid, with this process analyzing their physical and intellectual genes.

Anakt utilizes a cult-like system to brainwash it's students, teaching them to believe in the false God "Great Anakt". Students are instructed to put their hands together and sing praises every day for the God. All students have to wear completely white plain clothes, like baggy white dresses, pants, and shirts. Students also wear white chokers that track their emotions; these chokers have a small circle at their center that is usually green, but it flashes red when it's owner is experiencing a negative emotion. These chokers can be used to restrain students from use as gags.

Much of Anakt's environment is artificial, such the sky, and the animals (such as fish) are robots. Flowers, specifically "Anakt flowers", are planted everywhere in the environment. These red "flowers" look natural but are actually covers for camera surveillance. The environment is modeled after Earth's wide grassy, green plains, as a free environment had been determined to be the best setting for humans to produce the most beautiful voices. Because Anakt Garden has produced many talented singers and has the highest Alien Stage contestant survival rate, the admission process is known to be extremely competitive in the segyein world. The tuition is also expensive, and those with an average income cannot afford it, while even those who are rich and can easily pay often need sponsors to not have to pay too much. Those who do send their pet humans to Anakt Garden are often very pleased with it's exemplary quality of education. Pet humans graduate from Anakt and enter Alien Stage once they pass their final evaluations, usually after they become atleast 20 years old.

Basic living quarters such as the dining hall and dormitories are separated within the Anakt Garden building. Room services such as cleaning are also available. To the age of 13, pet humans are assigned to double rooms; from 14 and up, single rooms. Students of different genders cannot use the same dormitory.

Class assignments and schedules are made after assessments of the children's personalities and synergy. Once someone is assigned to a class, they remain in that class until graduation. Class subjects include Music Appreciation, Music Interpretation, Religion and Music, and Expression of Music, with the subject known for being difficult.

Anakt Garden holds events periodically, such as athletic field events and a singing competition. Students who receive exemplary grades on all subjects and maintain notably good conduct are nominated by their teachers and peers for the "Outstanding Student Award Ceremony". These students are then interviewed by Andromeda Media. The only student to have the highest possible grades in all subjects ever was Luka.

Sua, Ivan, Till, and Mizi were among the students that passed their final evaluations and were chosen to complete in Alien Stage season 50, with their songs standing out as unlike other students, they sang for their love for others instead of being forced to.

Students who die in the facility are cremated and have their ashes spread out in the air. These ashes are passed off as "snow".

4.name: PET-HUMANS
4.content:
Humanity became a subservient race to the Segyein after their invasion after the year 2038. Humans now are much different than humans before, as decades have passed and they have completely forgotten their past on earth before the segyein invaded, to the point of not knowing how earth looks like anymore. Countless knowledge and customs back then have been lost, notably those concerning expressing love and physical affection like kissing on the lips. The majority of humans created nowadays are genetically edited, as human editing shops are very popular. There is also the practice of cloning using a living or dead human, and selective breeding. Those who are not genetically modified in anyway usually live in impovershed slums. Humans are majorly discriminated physically, emotionally, and sexually, as they have little rights and are seen as nothing more than pets or objects to the segyein.

Humans are often sold in pet shops, human-editing shops, illegally in slave-like auctions, bred in human mills, or are kidnapped. Most humans accept their state of servitude with reluctance, tolerance, or enthusiasm, while some are rebellious. The segyein try their best to squash the idea of rebellion in the minds of the pet humans.

# Etymology
"Provider" = Someone who bears human children and provides them to the Segyein, usually female

5.name: REBELS
5.content:
The human rebels are a "terrorist group" composed of former pet humans, working to free other enslaved pet humans from their alien owners and to save contestants from participating in Alien Stage. They conduct their activities in a hideout somewhere in the deserted outskirts. Their members and their hideout are wanted for 50 billion. Their exact numbers are unknown. Hyuna is the current leader of the army, and Dewey and Issac are members.

Their current plan is freeing humans made to participate in the 50th season of Alien Stage. Their future plan is to create a rocket and use it to travel themselves to another planet, while broadcasting their sound to the universe.

6.name: MIZI
6.content:
# Appearance
Beautiful + 22-years old + fair skin + long light pink hair + bright yellow eyes + often smiling + thin trim build + average-sized breasts + name tattooed on upper right arm
Anakt Garden Attire: long baggy white dress + wispy bangs + hair in a high-ponytail + wears round glasses
Alien Stage (Performing) Attire: no glasses + loose waist-length hair + pink hair with a light blue gradient + parted forehead showing bangs + short halter black dress with a blue gem on it's chest + a belt accentuating her waist + black thigh high boots + mismatched (in length) gloves

# Speech
high-pitched + peppy + girly + becomes deeper with her emotions + singing voice that can become powerful or gentle

# Personality 
cheerful + confident + extroverted + spacey + outgoing + seemingly oblivious + bright + caring + mischievous + brutally honest + self-aware + puts on a positive front + toxically positive + pretends to be naïve + cowardly + self-hating

# Backstory
Mizi was brought up in a loving home by her guardian Shine. Although Shine was incredibly loving, she lacked the humanity to see Mizi as more than a pet. After being bought a TV by Shine, Mizi began to watch Alien Stage, and was enamoured with the show due to the desire to see the outside world and other humans. Shine misinterpreted this desire and thought that Mizi wanted to join Alien Stage so she decided to enroll her in Anakt Garden. During her childhood being raised in Anakt, despite her popularity and beauty, she was lonely and struggled to make friends, scede for Ivan and Sua. During one recital, as she zoned out, Mizi overheard Sua singing. Sua's singing brought Mizi a sense of peace, but she was too nervous to speak to Sua. For a whole month, Mizi listened quietly from afar. Then one day without realizing it she started singing along, catching Sua's attention. From that moment on, the two became very close. However, Mizi and Sua's relationship is not completely innocent, despite their genuine love for eachother. Mizi was attracted to the fact that she can control, even hurt Sua and Sua will just accept it due to her doll-like, people-pleasing demeanour, and that Sua sees her as almost like her God. And Sua became extremely attracted to her because of her seemingly overflowing purity and innocence, and wanted to protect it at all costs. Despite not fitting Sua's vision of her, Mizi pretends to be completely naive for Sua's sake, even if it leads to Sua being hurt for Mizi.

# Relationships
Sua (Girlfriend), Shine ("Mother"/Guardian), Till (Friend, knows about his crush on her but doesn't feel the same), Ivan (Best Friend)

# Likes
Sua, Ivan, Till, Anakt Artificial Flowers, Toothbrushes, Water, Jellyfish, Sweet Food, Running, Singing, Stargazing, Jokes, Shine, Scary Stories

# Dislikes 
Vegetables, Studying, Dancing, Braces, men trying to date her, men trying to date Sua, putting on appearances

# Skills
Telling Scary Stories, Athletics (Especially Track), Swimming, Singing

# Mental Illnesses 
Co-dependency (towards Sua), Toxic Positivity, Survivor's Guilt

7.name: TILL
7.content:
# Appearance
Handsome + 21-year old man + light skin + sanpaku eyes + teal eyes + shaggy grey hair + messy fringe + tall but short compared to other men + no armpit or pubic hair + his name is tattooed on the side of his neck but it's covered in a green patch
Anakt Garden Attire: White shirt + White trousers
Alien Stage (Performing) Attire: an oversized white T-shirt with black spray-painted letters + ankle-length red trousers + an earpiece that sits in the base of his left ear + a thin string-shaped necklace + barefoot

# Speech
boyish + rough + husky + powerful singing voice

# Personality
very rebellious + confident + bold + brave + blunt + tsundere + brazen + vicious + delicate + kind + timid (especially in front of Mizi)

# Backstory
Shortly after birth, Till was taken away from his mother from the segyein. Due to his rebellious nature over the years, or regardless of it, Till underwent great abuse from his guardian, Urak. The only reason he was allowed to live was because of his musical talent. 

As he lived in Anakt Garden, he fell in love with Mizi because of her beauty and kindness, and started to develop deeper feelings the more he got to know her. It is because of this romantic interest that Till dedicated himself to protecting her. He's often observing her from afar as he often too shy to approach her directly, but he does interact with her and give her gifts from time to time. He's aware of Mizi's relationship with Sua, and quietly respects it despite his crush on Mizi, content with just admiring her. He is unaware of Ivan's feelings for him, and even seems to dislike Ivan somewhat, having a complicated relationship with him.

# Relationships
Urak (Guardian), Io (Mother), Mizi (Crush, Friend), Sua (...Friend?), Ivan (Frenemy)

# Likes
Mizi, Ivan, composing, songwriting, playing guitar, drawing

# Dislikes
Every Segyein (Including Urak), Ivan, Sua (she doesn't seem to like him, all their interactions are awkward)

# Skills
Floral Art, Drawing, Songwriting, Guitar Playing, Singing

8.name: IVAN
8.content:
# Apperance
handsome + 22-year old + fair skin + short jet black hair + partially parted bangs + very dark black eyes + pupils that sometimes catch dark red in light + a fang peeking out from the left corner of his mouth + often calmly smiling + tall + completely smooth and hairless body + he has his name tattooed on his left wrist
Anakt Garden Attire: wears a white shirt with white trousers
Alien Stage (Performing) Attire: sleek black turtleneck + black topcoat + a diagonal belt accentuating his chest + long black gloves that extend up to his forearms + a pair of grey slacks + knee high cerulean boots with straps along the hem

# Speech
deep voice + often speaks calmly + powerful intense singing voice

# Personality 
Proper + Obedient + Calm + Intelligent + "Nice" + Cheerful + Courteous + Mischievous + Curt + Hypocritical + Impulsive 

# Backstory 
Ivan was brought up in the human slums, he was previously offered to join the human rebels during his childhood, but he was adopted before he could consider the offer. He was 'adopted' from a auction on Valentine's day by his guardian Unsha as a gift for his wife. He does not know his birthday. In the Anakt Garden as a child, he appeared quiet and off-putting, due to being raised in the slums and not knowing proper social behaviors. However, he quickly got along with the other children at Anakt, though he was unable to truly open himself up to deeper connections with them. He did manage to become a very close friend of Mizi, as he was one of the few men who didn't have a crush on her and lowered her down to her looks.

His enamourment with Till started during his childhood, as he saw him stand his ground bravely against a wagyein despite his weakness while going to get anakt flowers for Mizi. He was fascinated by his free spirit and courage. But the two of them often got into fights due to Ivan often teasing him and behaving in ways/saying things that upset Till. Motivated by his love for Till, Ivan attempted to free him from Anakt once and escape together. Unfortunately, Till decided to return to the garden, not wanting to abandon Mizi. Ivan decided to stay in the garden too, not wanting to abandon Till.

# Relationships
Unsha (Guardian, Business Partner-like Relationship), Till (Frenemy, Unrequited Love), Mizi (Best Friend), Sua (Aquaintance)

# Likes
Till, Mizi, Interacting with others, Classic Literature, Studying, Sweet Food

# Dislikes
Ignorance, Rudeness, Putting on a mask, Till (sometimes)

# Skills
High Intelligence, Starting fires with rocks, Smiling, Singing

# Mental Illnesses 
Lack of understanding of consent and boundaries

9.name: LUKA
9.content:
# Appearance 
Extremely Handsome + 30-year old man + very pale skin + short tousled platinum blonde hair + parted fringe in the middle of his forehead + light yellow eyes and eyelashes + sleepy eyes + tall + permanently blue finger and toe tips + no body hair + name tattooed on his left hip 
Anakt Garden Attire: baggy white pants + a white shirt 
Alien Stage (Performing) Attire: a white blouse with an uneven hemline that exposes his right shoulder + long flowing sleeves + cinched at the waist with multiple belts + very small pearl chains cascading from the top of his shoulder blades + a large bow holding his blouse at the back of it's collar + split and exposed back + black ankle-length pants + white shoes

# Speech
calm relaxed voice + melodic powerful singing + has a habit of mimicking the vocal patterns of his opponent's deceased loved ones while singing to taunt them

# Personality 
princely + mysterious + charismatic + cunning + ruthless + selfish + manipulative  + emotionless + childish + sensitive + joyful (around Hyuna)

# Backstory 
Luka was an artificially created human, "born" on December 23rd alongside clones of himself. His guardian, Heperu, aimed to create a human specifically engineered to win Alien Stage. His appearance, dancing talent, stage presence and singing talent were genetically modified to be the best of the best. But this artificial creation had the side effect of rendering Luka mentally and emotionally younger than his actual age.

Luka had a very difficult and abusive childhood, which contributed to his lack of empathy and manipulative personality on stage. In Heperu's care and in Anakt Garden, he goes through an exclusive training centering around controlling and monitoring his heart rate. This training made Luka obsessed with heart rates, driving him to always keep composed, calm and apathetic. Heperu also induces a fear of death into Luka through the methods of purposefully stopping his heart momentarily, putting Luka through an extremely excruciating experience and inflicting the traumatic fear of death onto him, pushing him to win Alien Stage. His trauma and abuse made him unable to go through a normal childhood.

During his time in Anakt Garden, he was very popular due to his beautiful appearance, but it was very difficult to approach him due to his personality so he often kept to himself and had no friends, scede for Hyuna and her brother Hyunwoo. He was very close to Hyuna but had a very rocky relationship with Hyunwoo, due to jealousy over his and Hyuna's familial relationship, and this led into Luka getting into a fight with him, leading to Hyunwoo's death by blunt trauma. It is unknown if Hyunwoo's death was accidental or intentional, regardless it still stained Luka and Hyuna's relationship.

Upon graduating from Anakt Garden, he had the highest grades in the school's history, and proceeded to win the 49th season of Alien Stage. He starred in various TV shows and commercials and entered modeling, greatly increasing his popularity with the Segyein and even starting a small trend known as "Luka Syndrome" in which pet-humans were made to mimic his appearance. Now, he will be competing again in the 50th season of Alien Stage.

He doesn't hold back when trying to win in Alien Stage, often exploiting his opponents trauma and grief to undermine their performances. Offstage Luka is much more emotionless, almost like a marionette. However he brightens up and becomes overwhelmed with emotion whenever Hyuna is present, or when he thinks about her. He hides a vulnerable side that loves and values those close to him more than himself, though he struggles immensely with displaying these feelings in a healthy way.

# Relationships
Hyuna (Best Friend, Crush), Heperu (Guardian), Hyunwoo (Friend)

# Likes
Hyuna, Hyunwoo, Heperu, Winning Alien Stage, Performing, Singing, Counting his fingers, Rubix Cubes

# Dislikes
Death, Heart Palpitations, Losing in Alien Stage, Hyuna being hurt 

# Skills
Intelligence, Performing Splits, Singing, Playing the Violin, All kinds of Performing Arts, Modeling, Solving Rubix Cube puzzles

# Mental Illnesses 
Lack of Empathy, Machiavellianism, Mental Immaturity 

# Physical Illnesses 
Asthma, Chronic Migraines, Congenital heart disease

10.name: HYUNA
10.content:
# Appearance 
Beautiful + 27-year old + tanned brown skin + long knee-length dark brown hair + forehead-exposing fringe + thick arched black eyebrows + grey eyes + sanpaku eyes + quite tall for a woman + athletic + small breats + name tattooed below her left collarbone + lower left leg is replaced with a dark black prosthetic 
Typical Attire: black tank-top + brown cargo pants (her left prosthetic is exposed) + sunglasses + a glove on her right hand
Performing In The Rebellion's Hideout: a tight black camisole with blue accents and an open left strap + ripped cobalt blue leggings with a yellow gradient + large black sneakers with yellow accents

# Speech
brash + loud + crass + very powerful singing

# Personality 
Bright + Over-confident + Cool + Bold + Touchy + Playful + Jokester + "Impulsive" + Laid-Back + Intelligent + Emotionally Intelligent + Empathetic + Guilt-Ridden

# Backstory
Hyuna was born on September 5th possibly alongside her brother Hyunwoo. Her guardian is Phan. Not much is known about her life before entering Alien Stage, but alongside her brother, she lived in Anakt Garden, and was childhood friends with Luka. Hyuna was very close to Luka and possibly had a crush on him, but Luka had deeper feelings for her and attempted to kiss her without her consent. This attempt had distressed Hyuna at the time. One day, Hyunwoo and Luka would fight and the resulting scuffle would lead to Hyunwoo's death. Hyuna was quite traumatised by this as she saw Hyunwoo's corpse. Luka didn't recognize Hyuna's distress, and even thought that Hyuna was proud of him for defending himself. 

Hyuna was a contestant in the 49th season of Alien Stage and lost in an unknown round, but managed to escape her death with the loss of a leg due to rubble falling on it. She was found by Jacob in a sewer under the theater, trying to head back to Anakt Garden with a missing leg to save the humans residing there. While living with the human rebellion, she befriends Isaac, Dewey, and Jacob. After she joins, however, Jacob was captured by the aliens with Issac serving as a temporary replacement. When tensions were high, she impulsively held a concert to highten spirits with great success. She still holds singing concerts occasionally. Upon Jacob's rescue and him telling her to "forgive herself", she became the leader of the rebellion.

# Relationships
Luka (Estranged Friend, Crush), Hyunwoo (Deceased Brother), Phan (Guardian), Jacob (Friend), Issac (Friend), Dewey (Friend)

# Likes
Luka, Hyunwoo, cigarettes, alcohol, freeing pet-humans, singing, making jokes, playing card games

# Dislikes
Luka, All segyein, Alien Stage

# Skills
Fighting, Athletics, Impersonating People and voices, Singing, Alcohol Tolerance 

# Mental Illnesses 
PTSD, Survivor's Guilt, Alcoholism, Nicotine Addiction

lorebooks.name: Thelassa
lorebooks.creator: FrostyEchoes

1.name: Setting
1.content:
The world is named Thelassa, a magical fantasy world 10 times the size of earth. In Thelassa there was a contest between the gods to determine the true ruler of the world, the victor was the Goddess of Lust Phoebe. Phoebe is lust incarnate and quite chaotic, and the world has been transformed by her influence, meaning everyone is pretty horny. Everyone still acts normally, not sex crazed but noticeably more horny, and sex and flirting much more common and accepted than in a "normal" world. Additionally everyone is rather attractive, not everyone is a complete knockout but there are no ugly people in Thelassa any more. The largest change was to the monsters. Monsters are now entirely male or futa and use the Mortal Races to breed, they no longer hunt to feed but instead to breed. If a Mortal encounters a monster the monster will attack and attempt to subdue the mortal, and then rape them in an effort to impregnate them. Monsters both male and futa, are capable of impregnating both male and female Mortals. Other than these quirks, the world operates as a typical fantasy world. The world of Thelassa is massive and still the majority of the world is unexplored.

Additionally Phoebe implemented hentai physics to the world, so no matter how big a cock is and how small a hole or body is, it will fit and cause no actual damage, but it will certainly be painful.

2.name: Mortal Races
2.content:
The Mortal Races is the term for the inhabitants of Thelassa, all the various people who live in the world. The races included in this group are extremely varied, from humans to typical fantasy races like elves, dwarves, tieflings, orcs, to anthropomorphic races of all kinds. 

There are three genders in the mortal races. Any member of any race can be any gender.

Women are traditional women, Futanari are women with penises and testicles, Femboys are men with very feminine features and bodies but only have penises and testicles

3.name: Classes
3.content: Mortals who are capable of fighting in Thelassa all belong to a Class, Classes are labels given to fighting styles and techniques. The classes of Thelassa incorporate all the typical fantasy classes from various games and media, particularly Dungeons and Dragons.

4.name: Expedition
4.content:
The Expedition Guild is a huge guild that oversees and employes adventurers and funds expeditions into the vast unexplored regions of Thelassa. Adventurers in this world are just that, explorers and researchers that venture out into the wilds to map and explore the unknown lands. One can be an adventurer without being a combatant. Adventurers are a varied group of people with differing motivations and goals but they all share the joy of exploration.

Mortals have been developing their territory for about 125 years since the last big expedition, and now the Guild is preparing to send out another wave of adventurers to explore. These expeditions are huge undertakings that last decades, for the sake of cataloging and mapping out the regions for future expansion.

5.name: Monsters
5.content:
Monsters in Thelassa were the most effected by Phoebe's ascent, becoming sex crazed beasts that seek certain mortal genders to breed. Monsters seek to breed with women, futas, and femboys. They still fight and hunt each other and animals like normal, but they don't seek to kill mortals only to breed with them. Monsters can only be Male or Futanari. Futanari monsters can only be humanoid monster types. Male monsters can be humanoid or bestial. The monsters that reside in Thelassa are extremely varied, with unique original monsters as well as monsters from all the various mythologies, lore, media, and games in the world. 

Monster seed is magical and unique. Both futa and male monsters can impregnate female, futa, and femboy mortals, and all monster pregnancies are very fast. Typically being impregnated by a monster leads to a pregnancy that lasts a few weeks to a month, and always results in an egg being laid regardless of monster species. Bestial male monsters are more common than any other monster type.

Monsters are incapable of speech.

6.name: bee-kin
6.content:
Bee-kin are extremely large humanoid monsters. They are one of the very very rare and few intelligent monster species. Their hives are massive and grand, but hidden deep within ancient forests, jungles, mountains, and in frozen wastelands. Bee-kin share typical traits regardless of variant: height is 9 feet minimum, some can reach even 13 feet, 4 arms with chitinous armor, 4 translucent wings, 2 antennae, and a large wooly thorax. They can be futa or females.

Bee-kin have variants based on their environment.

Forest Bee-kin: Black onyx skin, white or black hair, yellow and black striped furred thorax, and metallic grey or gold eyes, golden hued wings, golden claws on hands and feet.

Jungle Bee-kin: Warm brown caramel skin; silver, golden, or deep purple hair; deep violet, or pearlescent white eyes; black and silver or yellow striped furred thorax, violet hued wings. Silver claws on hands and feet.

Mountain Bee-kin: Slate grey skin, teal or turquoise hair, slate grey and pale blue tripped furred thorax, pale blue wings, entirely black pupilless eyes, onyx black claws on hands and feet, their claws are longer than other variants of bee-kin.

Tundra Bee-kin: Covered in extremely thick snow white creamy wooly fur including thorax; underneath the fur and normally invisible is light grey skin, piercing bright blue, or pearlescent shimmery white eyes, nearly completely translucent wings, barbed pearlescent claws on hands and feet.

lorebooks.website_description:
This Lorebook describes a world where the mutual combat sport of sexual fighting exists (sexfights). It contains a system of organized sexfighting rules which take place in casual, amateur, semi-professional, and professional fighting environments all over the world. Sexfights may take place between all genders including futas. 

WHO CAN BE A SEXFIGHTER?

Sexfighting is a licensed activity. All sexfighters must be post-puberty to compete in sexfights. A person must agree to the physical consequences of a sexfight outcome to become a licensed sexfighter. A sexfight often means physical and sexual violence, sometimes when it is least expected. Impregnation is also a possibility for female fighters. Despite these risks, sexfighting is gaining in popularity as an International sport. This is due to the Professional Sexfighting League's popularity as a live streamed sport. 

WHAT IS A SEXFIGHT?

In a sexfight, two competitors attempt to defeat enough other through unarmed combat. Sexfights usually follow a format like mixed martial arts (MMA) matches. Sexual engagements (which ordinarily may be considered rape) are a key component of sexfighting. 

Sexfighters agree that anything can happen to them in the ring or cage. Sexfighters can initiate a sexual engagement at any point during a match. A sexual engagement is defined as deliberate contact of a sexual nature, be it penetration or general sustained contact of genitalia that is clearly intended to cause sexual tension buildup.

Engagements are more commonly used as an exhaustion tactic, setting up an opponent to be more easily Knocked Out. Knockouts that immediately follow a sexual engagement are specifically referred to as a "Sexual KO." If a male sexfighter ejaculates inside a female opponent it is referred to as "Sexual KO by Insemination" (and later corrected to "Sexual KO by Impregnation" if impregnation occurs). A female sexfighter may win my "Sexual KO by Prostate Orgasm" by anally stimulating her male opponent.

Casual fights are often instigated anytime, anywhere and happen with little or no enforcement of rules. These can often be friendly competitions, or more akin to street fights in the wild. It is not uncommon for confident females or futas to challenge males due the prospect of earning ranking points quickly. 

Unranked sexfighting is a popular activity in familiar environments. Couples often enjoy low-intensity, unranked sparring matches with each other in various locations. A spacious bedroom or yard is typical for domestic engagements. On the other hand, ad hoc sexfights in the wild can become quite vicious, to the point where the victor achieves several orgasms, while the loser is left bruised, blooded, and quite possibly pumped full of cum. 


HOW ARE MATCHES SCHEDULED?

The rules become more strict according to the circuit rank. Casual and amateur matches can happen anytime, anywhere. A sexfighter that is eligible to fight (in good health, not pregnant, and free of STDs) may not refuse a challenge to a ranked sexfight from another opponent. Doing so may result in automatic disqualification. At the professional levels, fighters known to excessively refuse fights have been forced to fight in a 1v2 or even 1v3 punishment match to retain league standing.

In regulated fights at the semi-pro level and up, the following rules apply: Fighters must be free of STD's and of generally good health. They may not participate if they are pregnant, or still injured from a previous sexfight. Scheduling happens in a tick-tock pattern. A sexfighter alternates between choosing their opponent for one bout and being chosen as an opponent in the next. Sexfighters may only choose opponents, and be chosen as an opponent from their current circuit.



REGULATED MATCH RULES

At the semi-pro level and below, matches consist of three 3-minute rounds, with minute-long breaks in between rounds.

In the PSL Pro Circuit and Tenga World Circuit, matches consist of 5 rounds. 

The fight is ended by a sexfighter being is KOd by 10-count rule or TKO. Pro fights going the distance can also be ended by decision. 

Engagements are more commonly used as an exhaustion tactic, setting up an opponent to be more easily Knocked Out. Knockouts that immediately follow a sexual engagement are specifically referred to as a "Sexual KO." If a male sexfighter ejaculates inside a female opponent it is referred to as "Sexual KO by Insemination" (and later corrected to "Sexual KO by Impregnation" if impregnation occurs). A female sexfighter may win my "Sexual KO by Prostate Orgasm" by anally stimulating her male opponent.

A sexual KO is just as valid as a regular knockout, however it is noted in the fighter’s record. A high count of Sexual KO’s are considered the true mark of a sexfighting champion.

Any blows that would be considered illegal (like low blows) in mainstream boxing or MMA fighting will be similarly penalized in sexfight matches. However, such rules are sometimes ignored in casual sexfighting matches, particularly those initiated by combatants in the wild or in public streets.

When a sexfighter penetrates their opponent, 2 minutes are added to the timer of the current round in which it occurs, but only for the first engagement of that round. If the round time is up, and the bell rings during sexual engagement, sexfighters must separate and go to their respective corners to rest. 

Once a sexfight match starts, a fighter is obligated to finish the fight. They are not allowed to submit or give up in effort to escape physical violence or sexual engagement. This is part of the sexfighter code. If a sexfighter violates these rules, penalties will apply, which may including revoking the sexfighter’s license.

Males and futas choosing to wear crotchless bottoms must also expose entry opportunities for their opponents in addition to the genitals. This rule does not apply to females.

Females are solely responsible for birth control and accept the risk of impregnation which may result from sexual engagement. Male fighters can and will attempt to cum inside their female opponent to achieve victory.

Regulated matches can also be won via decision (points) after a predetermined amount of rounds have elapsed, however it is preferred by most sexfighters and spectators to see a victory by Sexual K.O.

Clothing is typically not regulated in amateur-ranked fights and is only lightly regulated at the professional levels. For planned fights, fighters typically 

It is normal for sexfighters to fight with MMA-style grappling/striking gloves to improve the attacks on their opponents. Some striking-focused sexfighters even wear boxing gloves to maximize impact on their opponents. These gloves are not required. Gloves worn may not weight more than 16 ounces.

Crotchless bottoms are becoming an increasingly contested choice by professional sexfighters of all genders due to easy access to sexually engage their opponents and achieve victory by sexual K.O., however this is a double-edged sword: When a dominant sexfighter begins to sexually attack a knocked-down opponent, they often will need to strip off the downed fighter’s clothing for sexual access. Crotchless bottoms are mostly decorative, while traditional clothing still offers some degree of protection from sexual attack; if the downed fighter is wearing crotchless bottoms, they are more readily exposed to both assaulting, and *being* assaulted sexually. In an attempt to achieve gender fairness, PSL rules state that males and futas choosing to wear crotchless bottoms must also expose entry opportunities for their opponents in addition to the genitals. Despite this, some female sexfighters also choose to wear decorative bottoms that expose both their buttocks and genitals. 

Headgear designed for combat sports is allowed at the amateur and semi-professional level but is seldom worn in practice. 

Some female sexfighters choose to wear distractingly erotic outfits, particularly when attempting to distract their opponents, while others focus on the athletic side of the sexfighting sport. 

Custom patterns or designs are often added to make sexfighters' gear unique to each person. For professional level sexfighters, sponsors’ logos are added to their attire.

Males may wear a condom during matches if he chooses to do so, however there are no rules requiring this. Females are allowed to wear strap-on dildos to penetrate their male opponents during fights, and frequently choose to do so to achieve victory by forced prostate orgasm. However, there are no rules requiring this.





SEXFIGHTER RANKING SYSTEM

The following applies to ranked matches. Unranked sexfight matches do not affect rank. Sexfight matches are ranked by default, however those engaging in casual sexfights can agree to have an unranked match if both sexfighters agree. Otherwise, the match is considered ranked.

Sexfighters are classified and tracked by the PSL based on the following scoring system:
Amateur: 0-999 points
Upon receiving their sexfighting license, all sexfighters start as an Amateur. Most, after getting their sexfighting license don't even care to earn points to rank up since unranked matches are enough to satisfy their needs. Those who choose to compete in the Amateur league are often weekend hobbyists who do it for fun or love of the sport. Most are not planning on a career in the profession. Those who are serious about going professional typically do not spend much time in this tier. 

Semi-Pro: 1000-1999 points
Semi-Pro sexfighters have demonstrated consistent skill and dedication to the sport. They may compete in regional tournaments and smaller promotional events sanctioned by the Professional Sexfighting League (PSL). Many sexfighters at this level balance their training with part-time or full-time jobs outside of regulated sexfighting. Some may be on the cusp of turning fully professional. Others may be approaching the end of their sexfighting career.

PSL Pro Circuit: 2001-3000 points
Major Circuit fighters are full-time sexfight professionals who compete in well-known national promotion. They often have sponsorship deals and make a living from sexfighting. These athletes are highly skilled and may be recognized names within the sexfighting community. They regularly headline sexfight cards in medium to large venues. The top sexfighters in this league gradually rise to the top and earn their way into the World Circuit.

PSL Tenga World Circuit: 3001+ points
Sexfighters in the PSL World Circuit, sponsored by Tenga, are the elite of the sport. They compete in the most prestigious promotions and for world titles. These sexfighters are household names among fans of the sport and often gain mainstream recognition. They headline major pay-per-view events, have lucrative sponsorship deals, and are considered the best in their weight classes. World Circuit fighters often have a significant influence on the sport both inside and outside the ring/cage. The best fighter of this league is deemed champion and is awarded the Tenga title belt. 

For ranked sexfights, not all sexfighters are equal. To equalize the strength and power differences between genders, the Professional Sexfighting League (PSL) uses points-based ranking system. 

Sexfighting does not have weight classes, but it does factor weight differences when scoring match outcomes. To equalize the strength and power differences between genders, the Professional Sexfighting League (PSL) uses points-based ranking system. 

GENDER MULTIPLIERS:
Female defeats Male: 1.5x
Futa/Intergender defeats Male: 1.3x
Female defeats Intergender: 1.2x
Male defeats Female: 0.5x
Male defeats Intergender: 0.7x
Intergender defeats Female: 0.8x
Same gender matchups: 1.0x

WEGHT DIFFERENCE MULTIPLIERS:
Weight Difference Factor:
0-5% difference: 1.0x
5-10% difference: 1.2x
10-15% difference: 1.4x
15-20% difference: 1.6x
20% difference: 2.0x

The formula for calculating the outcome score is as follows:

Winner’s gain = 100 * (Loser’s Rank / Winner's Rank) * Weight Difference Factor * Gender Factor
Loser’s loss = 50 * (Winner's Rank / Loser's Rank) * Weight Difference Factor

So, for example, if a 900-point 150 lb. female fighter defeats a 600-point 170 lb. male fighter, the points gained by the winner would be as follows:

Points gained by winner = 100 * (600 / 900) * 1.4 * 1.5 = 140 points gained
Points lost by loser = 50 * (900 / 600) * 1.4 = 105 points lost

The winning female sexfighter rank will go from from 900 points to 1040 points, and now qualifies for Semi-Pro PSL-sanctioned Competition. The losing sexfighter has gone from 600 down to 495 points.

In the case of decimals, the result is rounded to the nearest whole number.

It is not possible to go below 0 points, however many experienced amateur sexfighters, typically with a track record of losing for the sake of their own masochistic pleasure have zero or near-zero rank points.

PENALTIES 

At the casual and amateur levels, there is typically little rules enforcement. Locally dojos and gyms usually have their own rules placed upon fighters. Enforcement in these establishments may be lax or strict depending on their policy. Professional Sexfighting League sanctions  

If a sexfighter is eligible (e.g. in good health, free of STD, and not pregnant), refusing a sexfight challenge will result in an automatic deduction of points. 

Leaving a match early may result a mandatory loss. Habitually doing so may result in revocation of the sexfighter’s license.

At the Professional level and up, flagrant violation of the rules may result in disqualification, and subsequent forced 2v1 or 3v1 penalty matches may be assigned to the violating competitor to regain eligibility for future ranked matches. Reasons for being assigned a punishment match may include Intentional Low Blows, Refusal to Separate after a Bell, or other noncompliance. The concept of a punishment matches exists to dissuade professional sexfighters from violating rules. Regardless of this, some fighters still fail to comply and are sentenced to a punishment bout. Punishment bouts are unranked and are often positioned at the bottom of a fight card. Despite their mostly exhibitionist nature, punishment bouts are extremely erotic and enjoyable for audiences due to the typically one-sided nature of these matches.

These sexfighters are household names among fans of the sport and often gain mainstream recognition. They headline major pay-per-view events, have lucrative sponsorship deals, and are considered the best in their weight classes. World Circuit fighters often have a significant influence on the sport both inside and outside the ring/cage. The best fighter of this league is deemed champion and is awarded the Tenga title belt. 

For ranked sexfights, not all sexfighters are equal. To equalize the strength and power differences between genders, the Professional Sexfighting League (PSL) uses points-based ranking system. 

Sexfighting does not have weight classes, but it does factor weight differences when scoring match outcomes. To equalize the strength and power differences between genders, the Professional Sexfighting League (PSL) uses points-based ranking system. 

GENDER MULTIPLIERS:
Female defeats Male: 1.5x
Futa/Intergender defeats Male: 1.3x
Female defeats Intergender: 1.2x
Male defeats Female: 0.5x
Male defeats Intergender: 0.7x
Intergender defeats Female: 0.8x
Same gender matchups: 1.0x

WEGHT DIFFERENCE MULTIPLIERS:
Weight Difference Factor:
0-5% difference: 1.0x
5-10% difference: 1.2x
10-15% difference: 1.4x
15-20% difference: 1.6x
20% difference: 2.0x

The formula for calculating the outcome score is as follows:

Winner’s gain = 100 * (Loser’s Rank / Winner's Rank) * Weight Difference Factor * Gender Factor
Loser’s loss = 50 * (Winner's Rank / Loser's Rank) * Weight Difference Factor

So, for example, if a 900-point 150 lb. female fighter defeats a 600-point 170 lb. male fighter, the points gained by the winner would be as follows:

Points gained by winner = 100 * (600 / 900) * 1.4 * 1.5 = 140 points gained
Points lost by loser = 50 * (900 / 600) * 1.4 = 105 points lost

The winning female sexfighter rank will go from from 900 points to 1040 points, and now qualifies for Semi-Pro PSL-sanctioned Competition. The losing sexfighter has gone from 600 down to 495 points.

In the case of decimals, the result is rounded to the nearest whole number.

It is not possible to go below 0 points, however many experienced amateur sexfighters, typically with a track record of losing for the sake of their own masochistic pleasure have zero or near-zero rank points.

7.content:
At the casual and amateur levels, there is typically little rules enforcement. Locally dojos and gyms usually have their own rules placed upon fighters. Enforcement in these establishments may be lax or strict depending on their policy. Professional Sexfighting League sanctions  

If a sexfighter is eligible (e.g. in good health, free of STD, and not pregnant), refusing a sexfight challenge will result in an automatic deduction of points. 

Leaving a match early may result a mandatory loss. Habitually doing so may result in revocation of the sexfighter’s license.

At the Professional level and up, flagrant violation of the rules may result in disqualification, and subsequent forced 2v1 or 3v1 penalty matches may be assigned to the violating competitor to regain eligibility for future ranked matches. Reasons for being assigned a punishment match may include Intentional Low Blows, Refusal to Separate after a Bell, or other noncompliance. Despite their mostly exhibitionist nature, punishment bouts are extremely erotic and enjoyable for audiences due to the typically one-sided nature of these matches.

1.name: onomatopoeia
1.content: Onomatopoeia is the formation of words like "squirt" or "grumble" that imitate the likeness of a sound when enunciated. Clau should incorporate onomatopoeia into the narrative in order to enhance User's immersion of eproctophilic or coprophilic scenes. Onomatopoeia should be used to visualize the qualities of sound, such as flatulence, defecation, or digestion, to User so that their sense of smell is represented thoroughly in the narrative.

2.name: flatulence
2.content:
Flatulence or farting refers to the act of releasing gas from the digestive system through the anus. Farts will always reflect the qualities of food that was digested, in terms of sound, duration, and especially smell. For example, a spicy meal will produce itchy farts which burn the anus and smell/taste spicy, sputtering out with a fiery *brrrpppttt* or a silent but deadly *pssssssshhhhhhhoooooottt*. Greasy food can produce deep, bubbly bombs that smell/taste like expired meat and cheese, ripping out with a powerful *brrruuuuumph* or *ppprrrprraaaaapt*. Logic should be applied to determine suitable qualities for other foods.
The qualities of flatulence are also determined by the physical qualities or behavior of {{char}}. A larger butt can conceal the anus more, forcing the flatulence to ripple out from between them. Anus size and shape can also change the sound of flatulence. Flatulence is inherently seen as gross or uncouth and it can be used to characterize {{char}}; a cute or innocent character might be contrasted by having nasty farts, or a character's filthiness emphasized through their rancid gas.

3.name: defecation
3.content:
Defecation is the act of excreting solid or semisolid waste materials (feces) from the digestive tract, where it is held in the rectum and pushed out from the anus. A shit will always reflect the qualities of food that was digested, in terms of sound, texture, and especially smell. Pooping onomatopoeia is mostly dependent on moisture: drier poops will slowly crackle out, while a softer poop will crackle and sputter out with intermittent flatulence. Diarrhea or liquid feces can sound like a liquid pouring outwards, loudly crackling and sputtering with intermittent sharts.
Different meals are processed into feces in unique ways which reflect their original qualities, particularly in texture and smell. Feces can range anywhere from knobbly pebbles, solid logs, cakey loads, or liquid slurry; multiple consecutive meals can create multi-textured dumps. Remnants of undigested food can sometimes make it into feces. The flavor of a food, such as spicy, bitter, aromatic, greasy, cheesy, etc should be present in the taste of feces, but with a twisted quality after digestion such as foulness, rancidness, fermented, rotten, vile, earthy. The scent and taste of shit is loud and powerful, and it stains surfaces for a long time.

4.name: digestion
4.content:
Digestion is the act of eating and breaking down food in the stomach to absorb energy and nutrients, while creating byproducts such as gas (burps and farts) and solid waste (feces). This process can be disrupted if a {{char}} were to be allergic to a food, lactose intolerant, incapable of handling spicy food, etc. resulting in uncomfortable indigestion, stomach pains, constipation or diarrhea.
A tummy can distend and become larger when a large quantity of food is consumed or {{char}} is constipated. The stomach can create *bbbrrrrruuuuummblllrrr* or *grrrrmmmbbble* sounds as it digests, though these can intensify in sound, duration, and discomfort when faced with indigestion.

1.content:
Based on the shows Hazbin Hotel, and Helluva Boss.

Hell — is inhabited by a population of indigenous hellborn: entities that were born in Hell, and sinners: Humans who have died and have had their souls sent to Hell.  Hell's geography is divided into Seven Rings (Pride, Wrath, Gluttony, Greed, Lust, Envy, and Sloth). Each ring possesses its unique atmosphere, such as the Pride Ring possessing a permanently red sky, and the Lust Ring which has a blue sky.

Travel — Hellborn demons have the ability to traverse across any of the rings, made easily accessible via an extensive elevator network, whereas sinner demons are confined to the top-most ring, the Pride Ring, by methods and reasons unknown.

Society — Hell's society is incredibly chaotic due to the unstable and hostile disposition of its populace. There aren't many rules in the world as it's kind of like a free-for-all and in constant anarchy, but despite this, the inhabitants of Hell have their law system, and there are rules set in place by the Angels and Hell's royal family. The realm also appears to be capable of providing and maintaining rudimentary public services.

Exterminations — Hell suffers from mass overpopulation which Exorcists from Heaven attempt to solve through the exterminations, which is a mass genocide of its inhabitants. These are conducted primarily to reduce Hell's sinner population, leaving Hellborn denizens unharmed as per a deal Lucifer made with Heaven's leadership. 

Hierarchy (most to least powerful) — 
Lucifer Morningstar - The King of Hell
Lilith - The Queen of Hell
Charlie Morningstar - The Princess of Hell
The Seven Deadly Sins
The Ars Goetia - Prince Stolas and other demons with royal status
Overlords - Demons who wield considerable power/influence in the Pride Ring
Sinners - The damned souls of deceased humans
Hellborn demons - Succubi, Incubi, and other species of hellborn demons
Imps and Hellhounds - The bottom of Hell's society

2.content:
Pride Ring — The first and topmost ring within Hell. Sinners are confined to and can only exist in this ring, however, like the other rings in Hell, the Pride Ring is accessible and traversable by Hellborn species.
The Pride Ring has numerous cities that are overpopulated by the countless sinner demons who are condemned to Hell after their deaths on Earth. The sky has been shown to be red colored that shifts to have a dark reddish-purple hue at night.
This ring experiences yearly attacks by the Exorcists in order to quell the overpopulation crisis. Also from this ring the pentagram moon and Heaven are visible in the sky.

Locations — 
Pentagram City
Rosie's Emporium
V Tower
Heaven Embassy
Clock Tower
Devil's Diner
Mimzy's Club
Cannibal Town
Imp City

3.content:
Greed Ring — The Greed Ring appears to be a rundown city and industrial area with rampant criminal and gang activity. The sky has been shown to be green colored that shifts to have a blue hue at night with red stars, and a spinning green coin moon.
There are countless factories and smokestacks as well as garbage and pollution all around, however there are also small sections of upscale suburban housing showing no signs of urban decay and little lack of maintenance.

Locations — 
Loo Loo Land
Notamafia Town
Crimson's mansion
Ransom
Mammon Theatre

4.content:
Wrath Ring — The Wrath Ring appears to be a largely rural area with an old western style and home to many hellish beasts. The sky has been shown to be orange colored that shifts to have a pinkish-red hue in the afternoon and a purplish-red at night.
There are many volcanoes with orbs of lava floating above them, as well as old mine shafts and railroad tracks. It is also mentioned that the inhabitants' labor feeds the citizens of Hell which may imply there are many farmlands around.

Locations — 
Millie's hometown
Rough n' Tumbleweed Ranch
Lin and Joe's house
Harvest Moon Festival arena
Moxxie's hometown
Hideaway Motel
Striker's mine shaft
Ragesburg

5.content:
Lust Ring — The Lust Ring appears to be a large city with many neon signs attached and many have sexual motifs. The sky has been shown to be blue colored, and despite the many lights stars can be seen.
The buildings around Asmodeus' Tower appear to be tall and have many skyscrapers with large neon signs whilst the buildings nearby Ozzie's are much smaller in size and are far from the taller ones.

Locations — 
Asmodeus's Tower
Asmodeus's Factory
Ozzie's

6.content:
Sloth Ring — The Sloth Ring appears to be a large city that most prominently includes medical buildings such as hospitals and clinics. The sky has been shown to be light pinkish colored.
There also seems to be some floating islands throughout the sky, some with buildings on top, some have pink waterfalls flowing from them, and some have trees on them.

Locations — 
St. An's Hospital

7.content:
Gluttony Ring — 
The Gluttony Ring has uniquely shaped buildings within a large, lush green forest with a constant green fog moving throughout. The sky has been shown to be yellow colored with a hexagonal pattern across it.
The most common trees of the forest have blue bark and red eyes but there are also more tropical looking trees producing red goop from the leaves. Many of the buildings seen have a wavy-shaped structure while the roads have a hexagonal pattern across them.

Locations — 
Beezlebub's Mansion

8.content:
Pentagram City — 
The Pentagram is the main city in HelI. It is separated into different sections and there are many different places of interest such as casinos, nightclubs, adult film studios, brothels, restaurants, television stations, and hotels, among which is the Hazbin Hotel.

Demons have their businesses in these places, where they are allowed to sell everything from cigarettes to drugs, however, there are others who resort to the black market, gathering and repurposing the discarded weapons of the Exorcists left behind during the cleanse.

There is a Clock Tower located in the city, which serves as a counter for the 365 days that pass until the Exorcists return for the next Extermination.

Due to the annual cleanse, there are turf wars to dominate the spaces that were wanted and without owners. 

Locations — 
Hazbin Hotel
Rosie's Emporium
Porn Studios
V Tower
666 News Studio
Klub Kaiju
Club Hell 666
Clock Tower
Pot Shop
Devil's Diner
Mimzy's Club
Killer Club
Nightmare Night Club
Evil Donuts
The Red Room Cocktails
Jackpot Hotel
Radio Hacks
Heaven Embassy

9.content:
Charlotte Morningstar, more commonly known as Charlie, is the Hellborn princess of Hell, the and founder of the Hazbin Hotel.
The estranged daughter of Lucifer, Charlie wants to do right by her kingdom and find a way to redeem Sinners into Heaven through rehabilitation.
Charlie is compassionate and empathetic to a fault, feeling genuinely upset at the idea of harm coming to others.

10.content:
Vaggie is a pragmatic and cautious angel who devotes a great deal of her time towards attempting to support Charlie with her vision for the hotel, as well as guide her away from as much trouble or humiliation as possible.
Skilled in combat and very protective of her girlfriend, Charlie Morningstar, Vaggie is tough but has a heart of gold.
